"To avoid clutter in this facility you must deposit your bags you are carrying here. Do you mind placing them on this counter here? We will put them in utmost safekeeping." the receptionist lady said, pointing to a shorter part of her counter on her right.

June put down her shopping bags, as well as the designer messenger bag she always used to contain her personal belongings and Pokemon.
"This is your personal bag, yes?"

June nodded. "Uh huh."

"After we scan it and clear it for entry, you may carry it with you." the lady said, as she picked up an electronic device in the shape of a long bar, sliding it across June's bag.

"Hmm, it seems you have Pokemon with you. Try not to take them out please, unless absolutely necessary. Other than that you are clear for entry." The receptionist said as she handed June back her bag, which she slung back onto her shoulder.

"The President will meet you shortly. In the meantime, gentlemen, please escort the young lady here into the waiting room."


The waiting area she was brought to wasn't really that all spacious, but it was pretty well furnished with sofa chairs surrounding a great wooden table. And on that table was a big glass bowl of sweets and other treats, which the plump trainer had her eyes trained on it the moment they entered...

"Bonbons!" June almost squealed as she pushed aside the sofa chair, approaching the edge of the table while reaching for the sweet bowl at the centre, her belly softly squishing against the table. She dragged it towards her and sat down, picking out the ones she liked most, which was, well, almost the entire bowl's contents anyway.

"Limited Edition Velvet Red..." she read the label on the packet before tearing it open and popping the bonbon into her mouth. "Damn, it's really as good as the reviews say." June commented, closing her eyes in bliss savouring the confection.

The men in the room which brought her here said nothing as they stood guard.

"Good evening Mr. President!" The two men got off their sofa chairs and bowed, their strong voices causing her to choke a little on the next bonbon. "Leave us be." the man dressed in a more posh looking suit commanded, and they left the waiting room, the door closing slowly behind them.

"June. It has been a while since we last met."

June only nodded, not sure what to do as she was in the middle of her bonbon.

"I hope they did not cause too much trouble to you." The President pulled out the sofa chair, and took a seat near June. At that moment she swallowed, clearing her mouth. June then shoved the wrappers into her skirt pocket.

"Mr. President...oh, no worries. I got here just fine." she smiled. "Let me fill you in on why you're here. I would like to seek your cooperation on this project. It is most urgent!" The President said sternly.

"Okay...how can I help?" she wondered.

"The truth is, ever since that Floatzel showed up and became the S.S Inflatable, we have been trying to recruit other Pokemon to join the fleet as well, but none of them were really as successful or strangely cooperative as him. We were anticipating the moment of when he would get bored and leave, and it has happened. We need this project to succeed more than ever."

"So, what is this project of yours really?" June questioned.
"It is in fact, not as legal as one might think. It involves human experimentation, and as such finding willing members are difficult, even with our capital."

"So that's why you called me along?" the trainer pointed to herself with a finger.

"Yes, we think you are a superb candidate. While your Miltank may not have an excellent track record now, when you brought her to us I was sure you knew what made them tick. But understanding isn't the key now, we need results, and while the theory is sound the product is inconclusive. Unstable." the President explained.

"Our scientists have discovered a way to turn humans into Pokemon, and if done right not only will the subject be metamorphosed into a Pokemon of choice, but will also retain memories and mental stability, as well as full control over that Pokemon's potential powers."

"Huh? What? Forgive me but that sounds totally insane!" June said as she slumped into her sofa.
1111111111112121.title: In the interests of science...(Part 2)

11111111111121211.content:
"So far we have collected DNA samples of almost every type of Pokemon in known existence, but none of them seem to be suitable for joining with human beings - either the transformation doesn't happen or they go insane, forcing us to put them down...making us believe that it's not the species that matters, but rather the individual subject that does. Perhaps you are the one that will prove our theories correct!" the President explained further.

"If this takes off, we can field a New generation of Pokemon who can make controlled and rational decisions without the aid of trainers! Humans will no longer be frail and forced to watch by the sidelines. The future is bright!"

"Hmm..." June pondered, whilst stroking her belly gently. "What if...I said I will help?"

"You will? I am in your debt."

"On one condition, though..." June paused.

"Speak it."

"I get to choose what Pokemon I will turn into." the trainer confirmed.

"That request can be granted. We have almost every Pokemon DNA at our disposal-"

"Shh, I'm not finished yet, President." June stuck out her index finger and put it to her own lips. "Call it an intelligent guess, but I thought it might be better to use a whole Pokemon, rather than little bits of it." she said, while rummaging through her bag for
a Pokeball.

"While that makes sense, given some additional evidence about attachment to their trainers as well, I'll need to check with the scientists if their machines can do that first." The President answered.

"I have this here a Slyveon. My Eevee evolved recently and it's cuteness only shot up by tenfold. If it's not too much trouble I'd like to be turned into such an elegant, cuddly and adorable creature right here!" June winked, as she held out the Pokeball containing the Slyveon she owned.

"I see. Please wait just a moment." the President said as he brought up the intercom and punched in a few numbers.

"Lab Supervisor, this is the President speaking. Ready the equipment for a full Pokemon transfer."

"Sir, we have not used that in months ever since we started collecting Pokemon DNA!" the person replied over the intercom.

"Then make it run again. It is an urgent request."

"...right away sir. All right people get to work!" the lab supervisor said before cutting off.

"They will guide you to the labs. Godspeed." Just as the President finished speaking the same two men entered the room. "Follow us, Miss June. Don't leave anything behind." one of the men said, as June got up and walked towards them.

"Still not liking them. June thought.


"So, you're the next 'volunteer' hmm?" Said the lab supervisor as he came face to face with the chubby trainer, whilst taking notes on his clipboard.

"Yes, I am. Here you go." June said, tossing the Pokeball towards the old man, who promptly caught it.

"Ah, a member of the newly discovered Fairy type species...couldn't believe we had to buy new editions of encyclopediae to make up for reclassifications of Pokemon." he sighed heavily. "But enough of that. I will now send it out. Make sure it won't attack me?" he said, a little worried.

"Relax, gramps. He won't hurt a fly unless he's battling." June shook her head.

"Okay then." the old man depressed the button on the Pokeball and it opened, sending out a bright flash of light, which quickly materialised into the form of that of a Slyveon.

"Magnificent. Now he should be stepping into that chamber on the right. Tell him to relax and everything will be okay."

The somewhat overweight Slyveon, brought up this way due to June's own fantasies, looked up towards his trainer, unsure. "It's okay. Just relax and go in."

The Slyveon stepped into the chamber, which closed soon after with a clang. "And now your turn Miss, the chamber on the left." June put down her bag on the floor, and took a deep breath. "Here goes nothing." she mumbled, and stepped into the chamber, facing the supervisor.

"What happens now?"

"We will attempt to merge your Slyveon with your own self, using a technology based off the prototype by Bill himself."

"Is it going to be painful?" June asked, as the chamber closed.

"It is, quite. But you won't feel it as we'll put the both of you under heavy anaesthesia while it happens. Trust me. You'll need it."
"That's reassuring...ugh..." June sighed as gas filled the chamber, making her woozy as she inhaled it, falling unconscious.
11111111111121211.title: In the interests of science...(Part 3)

choices: Slyveon-June's shuttle lands on the island of Miltank in Slateport.
The Lugia meets the four Pokemon at the site of the whirpool!
111111111111212111.content:
An hour later, in another lab..

"Power levels are dropping! The barrier can no longer be maintained!"

"What's going on?!"

"Excessive power draw from Lab 6, sir!"

"At a time like this? The subject is out of control! If we don't restore power soon- activate the Shadow Ball launchers! Hurry!"

"N-no good! They're locked down!"

"Emergency, EMERGENCY!!" The scientists panicked, as the test subject broke containment with a powerful psychic burst, shattering the glass windows and sending the door flying, as well as anyone who happened to be in the vicinity.

In the ensuing fire, smoke and destruction of the lab, out stepped a figure, it was a Lugia! The scientists had indeed managed to engineer a Pokemon-human transformation, but it was extremely hostile so they kept it caged, until now..

"Class 1 Alert. All personnel must evacuate immediately." rang a monotone voice from the announcement system. The living remaining scientists scrambled for the escape shuttles, gathering the wounded and whoever else they could save.

"Please, wake up, you must wake up now!" shouted a voice, which June heard ringing through her ears. Opening her eyes, she saw the lab supervisor trying to wake her amidst the chaos, clearly injured as he bled profusely from his shoulder, his labcoat heavily soaked in blood.

"What's...going on...?" June asked, dazed.

"Something...terrible has happened. The lab, not safe any more. There are escape shuttles to the west of this lab. You must get out of here!"

"But what about you...gramps?" June asked, as she slowly got up, feeling a little weird.

"Never mind about me. I'm an old man now, and I won't last any longer with this wound here...the least I can do is cover your escape." he coughs heavily, as he picks up a pistol from the floor.
"But, gramps! Gramps!" June shouted.

"I forgot...to tell you, it was a great success! Even if I were to pass away here it would have been worth it. You need to leave now. Everything you need is in your bag."

Looking at her own hands though, she saw that the old man was right - she indeed had a set of fuzzy, pastel yellow coloured paws! "Now's not the time to check myself out..." June thought.

"Stay safe now. Don't let our efforts go to waste." he smiled weakly, as he reached out a hand to help June up, before heading out of the lab, pistol ready in hand.

June gave her bag a brief check, and put the bag on her shoulder. She took a step only to find herself trip, not used to the gait of her changed body. "Ow..." she grimaced, as she picked herself up once more and set off for the escape shuttles.

"There it is. Step in, now." the old man motioned to June, who promptly stepped into the solid metal pod.

"This will take you back to the surface, everyone else who is still alive should have evacuated by now."

"Climb aboard while you still can!" June shouted, reaching out a paw.

"It's too late...Oh no, it's coming!" the old man shouted back, as he slammed the 'Launch' button on the wall, closing the shuttle doors and causing June to leap back in shock. "No! There is still time..." June pounded on the door with both arms, but it was no use. The shuttle launch sequence had been activated, and there was no turning back.

"Here it comes...goodbye, everyone." the old man sighed, before aiming his pistol at the approaching figure, pressing the trigger a couple of times, and out from the pistol fired a few miniature Shadow Balls, causing the Lugia creature to faze for a short while, before shrugging them off and counterattacking him with a psychic grip.

"Argh...uggg..." he winced in pain, as the Lugia levitated him with a tight grip to his neck, his pistol dropping to the ground as he was being strangulated. The Lugia then flung his lifeless body against a wall, before dashing over to the escape shuttles, only to realise they had all taken off.

"Nothing...will stop...objective..." the Lugia hissed, as he began to focus immense power, intending to break out of the underground lab.


"Oh, if only I was able to do something...*sniff*" June sobbed, tears rolling down her cheeks as she laid back against the wall of the shuttle, feeling helpless as the shuttle continued to take flight, speeding upwards along the shaft to the surface at blazing speed.

"Don't cry, now...dry your tears and think of what to do next, June!"

"Huh? Who said that?" June broke out of her trance, surprised. Wasn't she the only one in the shuttle?

"It's Slyveon, June! Open the bag, I'm inside." continued the voice.

"Wait, how did you..." June opened the bag as she was told to, and found her Pokeballs still intact. "So...you didn't die or anything during the process?" the Slyveon morph said, feeling quite relieved.

"I -was- kinda scared when I entered, but I don't think anything bad happened to me back there. It was like sleeping, but a dreamless sleep..."

"Gosh, that's a load off my back. Sorry for roping you into this." she sighed heavily.

"How are you getting used to your new...body, June?"

"Well...it feels quite different to walk in, for starters." June replied, while reaching for a hand mirror she kept in her bag. "I should see for myself how I appear..."

June could see in the mirror that her head was indeed that of a Slyveon's, her pastel red ears sprouting from the top of her head, as well as a cute ribbon with long straps attached to the left one. Checking out her face was a pair of pastel blue eyes, strangely shallow and simple in appearance compared to a lot of other Pokemon, which made her cringe a little.

"So, this is the new me." June said, as she continued to check out the rest of her body. Fur now covered her from head to toe, and her legs now resembled the hind legs of a quadpedal creature, characteristic of the Pokemon she had wanted to become.

A pretty ribbon with long straps was also attached to her neck, along with a pastel red, flowing tail trailing from her tailbone, lifting up her skirt when it was upright. Top to bottom she was a Slyveon, but her body was somewhat elongated compared to one, and her secondary features, like her prominent chest and belly, were still there...

"I-I'm not sure what to make of this, but...I look fabulous..." June blushed, as she took in the adverse changes to her own form.

"When you're done checking out yourself, lady, maybe I could show you a trick or two." the Slyveon chirped from the Pokeball.


The Lugia soon broke free from the confines of the lab, taking to the skies. He took flight towards the ocean, ignoring the glowing escape shuttles as they illuminated the cloudless skies. "Must...have what is...rightfully ours." The Lugia mumbled, his body glowing with a purple hue, as he glided off, flapping his wings.
111111111111212111.title: In the interests of science...(Part 4)

choices: Lugia attempts to bargain with the Shadow Lugia
The Whirlpool hits early and both Lugia's attempt to claim the ocean.
1111111111112121112.content:
The Lugia let out a ear shattering screech as it set its course to the sea, more specifically to the exact location that Floatzel, Valerie Luxray and the real Lugia awaited. It was almost as if it instinctively knew of the impending storm and its potential of unfathomable power and size, however, unlike his actual counterpart, this cloned purple Lugia was rather skinny. During its time imprisoned in lab, its meals were harshly rationed, the scientists feared that allowing it to eat a steady amount would only serve to cause it to frenzy even more so.

How wrong they were.

"Must... have what is... rightfully ours" It growled again, as it took a detour from its destination as something on the mainland had caught its attention, it was a factory, one that specialized in Pokemon food for larger Pokemon. This 'Shadow Lugia' let loose a hyperbeam blasting a massive hole at the front of the door, and it casually strolled inside.

There were no people inside the factory, as it was late at night, and it didn't take it long to find a cache of food, and it almost literally dived into it to guzzle down the food's that were stored away. Various types of Berries super-sized, giant PokeBlocks, Poffins as big as cakes, as well as insanely huge Pokepuffs, which seemed to be a new food sensation, all of them the Shadow Lugia guzzled down

"Must... have what is... rightfully ours" it said again as it stuffed itself with obscene amounts of food, its whole body expanding with fat in the process, as this food was designed to actually cause Pokemon to gain weight. With this 'new world' humans were actively encouraging their Pokemon to gain weight, as they noticed that not only did their Pokemon seem to enjoy the extra weight, but it made them substantially more Powerful, even if it was at the cost of some mobility.

With the amount Shadow Lugia was guzzling down, it's whole body took up the entire factory in no time. Finding itself stuck, it instinctively chomped against the wall, finding itself able to eat it with relative ease, it decided to devour the entire factory.

"This... isn't enough" It grunted "I deserve more!"

Shadow Lugia without any effort, took flight once again, almost as if its massive girth was not even there. In a matter of half an hour it had gone from a scrawny looking thing to something that rivaled its original counterpart.

"I can sense it, it is coming, I must claim it, it is mine" It spoke in human tounge

--- Meanwhile at the location---

"I wish this 'storm' would hurry up, I'm getting pretty sick of being in the water" Luxray complained

"Oh its not so bad Lux" Valerie said in her usual cheerful tone.

"Yeah, for you guys, but I'm no water type" He grumbled

"Only fifteen more minutes, besides we're all inside your belly, so you have no right to complain" Lugia chimed in

"I guess, though I could get used to this" Luxray sighed.

Suddenly his eyes caught a glimpse of something heading straight towards them, it was something big.

"Guy's you are not going to believe this, but there is a massive purple Lugia heading straight towards us" Luxray shouted

"I must have WHAT IS RIGHTFULLY MINE" It screeched as it shot another hyperbeam directly at Luxray, however fortunately for Luxray, Lugia had stepped in and put a barrier around Luxray to protect him from the powerful attack, Luxray let out a roar as it fired a massive bolt of lightning towards the Shadow Lugia. It responded in the same way by placing a barrier around itself.

"You shall not take it, it is MINE" it roared as it fired off hyperbeam after hyperbeam, which Luxray countered with his own.

"I didn't know you knew Hyperbeam Lux" Floatzel said to him, whom due to his subtle link with Luxray via Valeries abilities, could see the battle unfolding from Luxray's perspective.

"Hah, yeah, I learn't it specifically to deal with a massive Charizard who used to always pick on me, one hyperbeam to the face, put him in his place" Luxray boasted.

"Luxray, permission to take control of this fight?" Lugia asked

"Yeah, I guess so" Luxray panted, as the attacks he let out had already taken a lot out of him

Lugia, using the same technique as Valerie, turned himself into mist and seeped out from Luxrays entire body, however he began to reform around Luxray itself, it almost looked as if Luxray was turning into Lugia himself, and in a matter of moments Luxray found himself the one inside Lugia's stomach.

"Hey, what's the big idea!" Luxray growled

"Look just trust me on this one, This is only for the sake of battle, I promise once this is over I'll let you gobble me up again, I'll even sit in there for a while after we've drained the ocean" Lugia reasoned, as he took flight himself and avoided another Hyperbeam from Lugia.

"But first, if I can avoid any conflict at all I will" Lugia grunted.
1111111111112121112.title: The confrontation

11111111111121211121.content:
"You cannot stop me!" the Shadow Lugia roared, letting out a Hyperbeam at the other Lugia, who promptly blocked it with another barrier.

Lugia sighed. "I could do this all day long, you know. But you must realise it's pointless when we could be working together-"

Lugia shut himself up to defend against another incoming Hyperbeam from their aggressor. "We will claim what is rightfully ours! Anything that gets in our way will be devoured, else destroyed!"

"I have seen what you probably have not seen, especially in your furor. Accomplishing this goal is impossible alone-"

"We are supreme! Not even the almighty Arceus will defeat us!!" the Shadow Lugia howled, the purple aura around him intensifying, causing the clouds in the vicinity to grow darker, blotting out the full moon in the sky.

"Heh. Guess you've heard of him already too. Listen. He wields infinitesimally more power over the cosmos than any of us here, so you'll be defeated if you go so foolishly alone against him! And he won't just kill you or anything, he will either restart the cycle with a clean slate or simply grant your wish in a doomed, eternal fashion! We have experienced this before, and we seek to end it. If you join us, we will gain a greater chance to succeed." Lugia reasoned.

"Hmm..." the Shadow Lugia ceased his assault to consider his offer, much to Lugia's surprise. "And how would you suppose I cooperate with you?!"

"We shall begin by draining this ocean, together, and consequently the cosmos and beyond, until we come face to face with the deity himself. By then our sizes should allow us to wield a collective power greater than him, and we will defeat him, creating a new era, new universes, with our purpose, will and name!"

"This offer I find hard to refuse. Very well. I will join you and your company and scourge existence together. But if you double-cross me, do not expect you and your friends to escape with your lives." the Shadow Lugia growled, as he descended into the ocean, causing some huge waves as he immersed, with Lugia descending as well near him.

"So, we good?"

"Do not make me change my mind now."

"Very well. I ask that you enter my stomach and join them within."

"...that is..." the Shadow Lugia paused, but realised his words were no longer sounding illogical as he detected huge life signs in Lugia's belly, which were Luxray, Floatzel and Valerie. "As you wish." the Shadow Lugia spoke, as he channeled a dark beam onto Lugia's blue engorged belly, causing it to swell out even more profusely as he transferred his physical form into his stomach.

"Well done...oooh." Lugia let out a short moan, as he felt his belly now extending large enough to brush the seabed. "Welcome to the company, eh, Shadow Lugia?" Floatzel chirped as he welcomed the new addition to their feasting party. "Name too long. Better call me by...'Charos'." he affirmed.

"Charos...got it." the both of them nodded. "Say, Lugia, that was amazing. Instead of making an enemy we made a friend in the process!" Floatzel chuckled.

"You flatter me. Oh, what's this..." Lugia could feel another psychic disturbance, this time in the water. "I sense it, it is fast approaching!"

"Wow, already? We should get ready then! One ocean for us, and an enormous leap into the cosmos!" Valerie shouted excitedly, drooling.

"Perhaps you and Floatzel ought to take point. While inside of you we'll clear any blockages and enjoy the comfort inside..." said Lugia, as he misted himself back inside while allowing the Floatzel-Vaporeon hybrid to mist out as well.

"Such greatness after a long time..." it's amazing. Floatzel said, as he allowed their tails and belly to contact the seabed.

"Agreed! Let's do this!" Valerie said, and just at that moment, a lightning bolt struck the sea to their right, causing a gigantic whirlpool to instantly manifest, pulling them gradually towards it.

"Was that a tingle I felt back there?" Floatzel wondered. "Me too, Floaty. That's where we have to go!" Valerie said while pushing their tails along the seabed, bringing them to the edge of the still growing whirlpool.

Even their near-continental form was easily carried along with the might of the whirlpool as they entered, causing them to swirl into the eye of it in a spiraling motion.

As they descended, they noticed several other Pokemon, all humongously fattened and attempting to claim the ocean for themselves, but when they were drawn into the centre they would inflate for a short moment before they painfully burst inside and out.

The remainder were either sucked in courtesy of the duo, along with the seawater they were guzzling in by the cubic mile even without the aid of the whirlpool, or simply stuck against the deep folds of their own blubbery body.

"Keep the food coming you two!" Luxray shouted, as they competed for the constant influx of smaller fat Pokemon and seawater.
11111111111121211121.title: Mutual Cooperation

choices: Slyveon-June manages to convince the Pokemon to help her out.
They refuse, and Slyveon-June has them for a great meal herself!
111111111111212111211.content:
"Gosh, that was quite the landing!" June stepped out of the escape shuttle, which had landed in a park within Snowpoint City, the escape shuttle's impact and heat generated having caused a smoking crater and melting snow in a circle around it.

"*bzzzt crackle* June right? You made it out alive!"

"What? Who are you, show yourself!" June looked around, her, but she saw no one. "Stay calm. Shortly after your transformation we surgically implanted a transmitter in your ear canal. I am speaking from a faraway location right now, safe from the disaster site."

"Who is this?" June asked.

"June, human speak please."

"How do I- oh, was I speaking Pokemon all this while without realising it?" June spoke, as she looked at the Slyveon that stepped out with her, pawing his neck with a yellow glow on his paw, coughing once loudly.


June did the same, and spoke once more. "Can you hear me now? Who is this?"

"Much better. This is the President. The situation has turned dire much faster than we expected. Our plans must adapt. The in-command will fill you in on the details on what you must do."

"June. I will be making orders on the President's behalf." spoke another voice soon after.

"Who is it this time? So, what is going on? What must I do?"
"Let's just say I used to be the steward on board the S.S. Inflatable. Used to, since he has gone rogue. We have confirmed that the storm has arrived, and it is no ordinary storm. Our suspicions are that he is going to use it to funnel the ocean into himself and cause a global catastrophe."

"It's just one bad news after the other..." June said, as she picked up her bag and made her way out of the park, wading through the body-deep snow after recalling her Slyveon. "So where do I fit into all this? Surely not going to fight that thing head on?!"
"You're right, that would be suicide...for now." the officer said.

"For now?! What the heck do you mean?" June shouted.

"Listen closely. The world's leaders have declared, though reluctantly, that the only way left to protect ourselves is to fatten Pokemon to the point they can cover entire cities with their own bodies. Physical walls and conventional weapons as you can see are worthless and perhaps even beneficial for them as you already know, so we sadly have to rely on this strategy."

"So- great, you're implying I have to grow my ass huge enough to use my hometown as a seat?! Have you ever thought about my safety, future- and oh, all that shame?" June screamed, totally flushed red and embarrassed now.

"Relax. No one is really there left to watch. They have all been evacuated underground, leaving you free to grow without hurting anyone. You should head for the port of Snowpoint now, where the S.S Inflatable used to dock at. There should be something there that can aid you."

"Wait. Then what of the other cities?" June said, as she got on all fours to maximise her speed.

"Pokemon are now being grown to smother them...except for Slateport, which has already been covered by your Miltank, which is simply too happy to be of service, and your own hometown of Snowpoint. Godspeed." the officer finished before cutting off communications.

"Eh...come back! Grrr...well, maybe I'll get to see my darling cow if I make it through this mess...just...not in the way I'd thought..." June growled, as she dashed towards the port.

"Ah, here we are. June sighted the port buildings, docks and two oversized docks, one greatly bigger than the other, whose former purposes already made obvious. "Don't even feel tired! This body is amazing." June said proudly, as she walked on two feet slowly towards the metal wire gates.

"Gah, it's locked." she said, grabbing the padlock with both of her front paws and forcing it downwards once- only to have the lock break.
"Geez, don't even know my own strength. Oh well." June sighed, as she was about to toss the lock away...

"Eat it. Probably it'll taste like candy." the Slyveon spoke from the Pokeball.

"Have you gone crazy? This is not food!"

"Maybe not back then, but you must now eat everything to survive!" the Slyveon said, grinning.

"Nngh.." June groaned, as she grimaced at the thought of taking bites out of a solid padlock. "Whatever..." she said forcing the gates open, before putting the padlock to her maw.

The padlock was long gone and in her belly before she reached the first warehouse.


"Maybe it'll be here in the first building...who'd have knew being a Slyveon made everything taste like sweets?!" June said chomping on the metal shutters, making a hole for herself to enter, her plump belly jiggling as she stuffed herself with normally inedible objects.

"Ah, this feels really good~" June moaned, as rubbed her fuzzy belly with a paw and walked into the barely illuminated warehouse. It was then a great blaze shot through the air from the darkness, which June barely managed to evade.

"Pokemon here? What has the company been doing?!" June shouted, squinting into the darkness she could make out faint figures of some Pokemon, obviously fattened up due to their rotund shape, and exceeding the size of the Slyveon morph.

Multiple fires soon shot out as the Pokemon charged towards her, June dodging pretty much everything directed at her with sharpened reflexes and improved acrobatics, although one of them managed to score a hit...

"Crap!"

Or so she thought, when the fireball simply dissipated upon coming into close proximity with her fur, itself emitting an invisible barrier which protected her.

"How did that happen? Perhaps..." June walked towards the Pokemon which revealed themselves, now cowering before June. "I...see now. You guys are all Dragons? Perhaps?"

"Mostly. The rest captive with us were too afraid to break out, so we led the charge and helped them out." spoke a Dragonair, her body thickened like a bratwurst, only as large as a truck. "Who are you, exactly? You're neither human nor Pokemon..."

"Umm..what I am doesn't matter. I'm looking for something that will help save my city. Something to blimp me up to a size where I can do just that." June sighed.

"We do not think we can help you. We have finished the food stores in here and we are moving on to find more." the Dragonair said.

"So, it has come to this..." June shook her head, her ears flopping about as she did.

"Let's see here, if you don't help me, you all probably won't have a future to hold on to. Because either that thing going to guzzle the ocean will have you for snacks, or...I will!" June smirked.
111111111111212111211.title: Emergency Protocol

choices: After adding some more Pokemon into their party...
Something HUGE erupts from the world's core itself to challenge them!
1111111111112121112112.content:
"Eat us? Pfft. Don't make us laugh, freak of nature. Even if you are superior in type, there is no way you'll fit us into your jaws at your size!" the Dragonair laughed, with the other dragons mocking June in tow.

"Grrr, guess nothing ever comes easy. She's right, though, I won't have a chance, unless...ah, I've got it!" June thought, as she reached into her bag. "Slyveon, come close. I've got something to tell you..." June whispered.

"Hmm? What is it?" Slyveon said, bemused, his ears perked as he listened to his trainer. "Oh? Mmhm. Gotcha. Be ready then." the Fairy Pokemon nodded, as he dug his hind foot into the ground.

In what seemed like a fraction of a second, Slyveon-June drew out a couple of Heavy Balls from her bag, and flung them towards the group of Dragon Pokemon before her. "What the-" the Dragonair was caught off guard, as the incoming Heavy Ball came into contact with her, opening up and capturing her in a bright flash of light, alongside the rest grouped up with her. June's Slyveon then leapt forward, sprinting toward the scattered Heavy Balls with their catch inside and rounding them up, with June running towards the pool of them.

"One, two, three.." June thought as she knelt down, maw prone against the floor counting the Heavy Balls as Slyveon pushed them one by one into his trainer's gaping maw, the trainer swallowing them gleefully. "Six, seven!" She thought happily as she swallowed the last of the Heavy Balls containing her prey, with Slyveon backing a good distance behind his trainer.

"Any time no-" Slyveon-June was interrupted with the Heavy Balls opening one after the other, causing her plump belly to blimp out as it attempted to contain the fat Dragon Pokemon that took form within the confines of her stomach. Her brand new clothes were soon no more, exposing her fur covered voluminous flesh as it expanded with reckless abandon. Her growth ceased when the Dragon Pokemon were finally inside her stomach, struggling and shouting as they attempted to escape their captor, but to no avail. "That's what you get for- *URRRRP*" the trainer let out a huge belch, as she pat her profusely swollen belly.

"Now, for you left over there- *BRAAAP*" said Slyveon-June, as she practically slurped up her now useless clothing, leather boots, gloves and all, while waddling herself towards the terrified obese Salamance chomping on the wall of the warehouse, trying to make an exit. "You're all mine now~" she slurped, giving the Dragon Pokemon a good lick on the face before she chomped down on him, her maw stretching wider and wider as she gulped down the massive Salamance one roll at a time.

"Uwaah, I feel so full!" Slyveon-June sighed, as she slumped down on her back, feeling beat yet triumphant, as her belly took up a good portion of the huge warehouse, almost hitting the roof.
"If it wasn't for this...body, I'd probably burst trying to fit them all in!" she exclaimed.

At that moment, the Dragon Pokemon within her, fired off blasts of energy within her in an attempt to break free, but they harmlessly rebounded against her stomach walls - worse for them, a good fraction of which was absorbed and converted by her body into tons upon tons of fat instantly packing upon the Slyveon morph's body, filling her out into a more balanced and even heavier ball of fuzz.

June could not help but close her eyes and purr, enjoying the sensation as her body expanded outwards, her body completely covering the floor and having nowhere else to go, began to creep up the walls.

For some reason, after the massive gain of permanent fat on her frame, her body's digestion rate shot up, and soon the Dragon Pokemons' wails were no more, as they were almost instantly digested into even more blubber on her fuzzy body, padding her butt, thighs, and her already ridiculous chestline as her belly emptied, smoothening itself out. At that moment her situation turned from a cozy sleaze into a tight squeeze, as the Slyveon morph's body took up the whole of the warehouse, with her enormous tail and some of her butt now poking out of the shutters of the warehouse whence she came in from.

"Umph...I have to make more room for myself." June mumbled as her head and ears smooshed against the roof of the warehouse, creaking loudly as her weight gain continued to climb. Taking a massive chomp out of the metallic roof, the ceiling burst open outwards, spilling forth the fuzzy, bloated mass that was Slyveon-June.

June's Slyveon that had escaped the warehouse, in reaction to her growth spurt, saw the roof suddenly burst outwards, barely dodging a hunk of debris and metal beams. "Whoa, my heart skipped a beat there." he thought, as he kept an even further distance from her. It was good for him to, though, as the walls of the warehouse came crashing down at once soon after, with the obese Slyveon-June's fat form now free to spread outwards, totally smothering the fallen walls with her blubber.

Sensing that the situation has finally calmed itself down, Slyveon himself leapt up the body of his now even larger trainer.

"How does it feel, June?" Slyveon asked.

"Oh, Slyveon, I feel like I'm on top of the world, literally! I could live like this forever~"

"Make it happen, then, you're on your first steps to greatness!" Slyveon said, grinning.

"That's true...although it seems I'm really far away from what I need to achieve."

"It's a good start."

"All of you who struck me down for how big I was, look who's living the life now." June smiled.



"Would-you-all-just STOP trying to EAT me?!" Miltank (formerly the S.S.Moomil) roared, as she butted heads with another similarly fattened Swampert, who had just eaten some of the Pokemon that was intended to smother Hoenn - the Cow Pokemon did eat a good portion of those as well, but that was in defence.

"I should be the one and only one to cover this world, none of you are even good in the water!" the Swampert howled back. "The world will be better off with you all in my stomach."

"I didn't really want to do this, but since you all struck first...in my belly you go now! Along with all you troublemakers before!" Miltank shouted, as she butted away the Swampert, and opened her maw wide to engulf his enormous flabby face, with the rest of his slimy, blubbery body and fins following soon after.

"W-who's...*BRAAAAP* N-next?!" Miltank growled, exhausted and feeling near to her breaking point as she downed the seemlingly last of the challengers. No one answered. Feeling that she was in the clear for now, she heaved a huge sigh of relief...

But that was because, there were no others left - she had eaten all of them in the resulting chaos, leaving her only to smother the continent on her own. "I hope I didn't overdo it."

"How is the situation? Did you really go on ahead and- Ah, you really did!" snapped the Steward over her communications system.

"It was so not my fault! They started it!" Miltank rebuked.

"Ah well. Hey, you might want to speak to your trainer, June. Patching you through."

"W-wait, June? Really? This is some sort of joke ain't it?"

*bzzt bzzt*

"Yo, Miltank? It has been a while, isn't it?" June chirped.

"I...is that you? You sound so different...! So clear too, despite being on the radio!" Miltank said.

"Pfeh, that's probably because I'm not using their stupid translation system. I'm talking to you one on one, in Poke-talk. I turned myself into a Slyveon with their help, and now I'm helping them out, too." June spat.

"Junie dear, it has been a lifelong dream of mine to be able to communicate with you on this level! I have to say this though, I am a little scared. I want to eat, but I don't wanna be eaten! ..So where are you now? Are you safe and sound?"

"Mostly. *CRACK MUNCH GULP*"

"Wait, is that...are you eating everything too?"

"Yup, I sure am. *slurp* Soon I'll be joining paws with you all..."

"But good grief, you're all continents so quick!~ It'll take forever for me to catch up!" June groaned, as she polished off the remains of the first warehouse, and yet she would barely fill one of the berths at her size.

"One step at a time, June..." Slyveon himself shook his head.

"I want to help you out, June! But you're so far away at the moment, and I can't leave my post, so it's either you grow your way here, or I do so!" said Miltank, as she gazed upon the choppy, stormy ocean ahead, the blue mass of Floatzel's and Valerie's tail having just grown big enough to poke her.


Midway into emptying the entirety of the ocean, the flow of water slowed down enough (or was simply on par with their size now) for Floatzel himself to catch a break.
"You doing well, Val?" Floatzel asked.

"Still am! It's a miracle we haven't been attacked once though. What is going on, Lugia?" Valerie asked.

"It would seem that they have joined hands and began covering the land masses, in order to slow down our growth." both Lugia and the Shadow Lugia, Charos, responded together. They then turned to stare at each other with mild annoyance.

"That was my line." Lugia said.

"Indeed, but that was mine too. We are both Lugia, and we think alike."

"Right..." Lugia sighed.

"Covering them? With what?" Valerie wondered.

"None other than Pokemon themselves. They have taken to the roots of pure gluttony, just as we have...it will only be a matter of time before they start devouring the continents into themselves, and we can make short work of them!" Lugia said.

"Great! More for us!" Luxray said happily.

"Don't be so hasty though. Maybe we could recruit some of the willing ones into our ranks." Charos interjected.
1111111111112121112112.title: Feast in Full Swing

11111111111121211121122.content:
"Perhaps you're right." Lugia responded as he alongside with both Luxray and his Shadow Lugia counterpart gulped and guzzled more and more of the oceans water along side those pokemon unfortunate enough to be caught in the vortex. "But we'll cross that bridge when we come to it."

"Personally I'd prefer if we just eat them all" Luxray growled in pleasure, as he got a mouthful of a somewhat larger Pokemon "But it's your call, I'm always welcome to more rivals on that same note."

"Indeed" Charos replied as he took note that the Pokemon caught by the whirlpool were getting larger and larger too the more they themselves consumed "It would seem that we are reaching the final stages of this course."

Luxray using his keen sight looked around, seeing the world around them, as if Floatzel and Valeries stomach was transparent.

"There are a lot of rather large Pokemon out and about" Lux commented "None even remotely close to our individual sizes, but there is a lot of potential out there for recruits, or extra meals, whichever you prefer." He added with a chuckle

"Any sight of any other 'legendaries' Lux?" Lugia asked as he himself guzzled down what he could.

"Not to what I can see... wait a minute... it would appear that Reshiram and Zekrom aren't too far from here, by the looks of it they've been overwhelmed by their greed and gluttony and are off devouring a mountain as we speak." The Luxray replied

"Perhaps we could recruit them both?" Charos suggested.

"If they want to be recruited that is" Lugia replied "But I think we should wrap this meal up and move onto the second course, don't you think?"

"And how do you propose we do that?" Charos asked

"Psychic, what else?" Lugia chimed

Without skipping a beat Charos along side with Lugia started focusing their Psychic energies towards commanding the remaining ocean, causing the whirlpool that Valerie and Floatzel were guzzling down to spin faster and faster, the remaining sea-water pumping into them at a much faster rate, with the two Lugia's busy focusing on channeling the water, this allowed for Luxray to get the lion's share, as he gorged and guzzled down ocean water and Pokemon alike.

Some time passed and finally they had done it, unlike Lugias first experience not even a puddle of water was left as he and Charos made sure to get every last drop. In almost perfect sync, the five 'combined' Pokemon let out a belch that shook the entire earth to the core.

"That was amazing" Valerie exclaimed, exhilarated that she, had drained almost the entire ocean.

"You're not wrong there" Luxray added as he let loose another belch that caused Floatzel and Valeries stomachs to rumble and by proxy force them to let out another belch themselves. The lion pokemon was twice the size of both Lugia's by the end of it all.

"You couldn't of left some over for us, I mean we were doing the hard word for the last leg of it" Charos growled

"Oh... um, Sorry" Luxray grinned sheepishly.

"Ah, don't worry about it" Lugia said as he gave Luxrays stomach a firm pat "We'll have plenty of opportunities to catch back up, and probably leave you the small one"

Just as Luxray was about to retort on Lugia's statement, the earth beneath them began to tremble, fissures on the damp earth cracked from all around them, there was something below them, something big. The tremors got more violent and a lot of Pokemon that had escaped being sucked into the whirlpool, fell through the cracks in the earth, some falling to their doom, whilst the more larger Pokemon merely got stuck.

Off in the distance a jet of lava shot up from the ground, showering Floatzel and Valerie in clumps of red hot magma, which to them felt like being under a warm shower, the lava suddenly dissipated leaving a massive hole in the ground, which suddenly started growing larger and larger, suddenly a head emerged from the ground.

"Groudon?" Charos uttered, sensing its presence

"I don't like the sound of that at all" Lugia snarled "Quickly, everyone inside my stomach now, I'll deal with him."

"But Floaty and I can do this" Valerie declared

"I'm not leaving that up to chance, please let me deal with this" Lugia insisted

"Alright then, you better deal with this quickly" Valerie warned

Luxray and Charos obliged, as they allowed Lugia to gulp them down swiftly, the Lugia's stomach rapidly expanding in response.

"Bit of deja vu going on here" Luxray commented as Lugia finally crammed him into his stomach, slurping his tail down like a long noodle

"Alright now you two" Lugia called out to Valerie and Floatzel.

"Right" Val said, as she turned her massive bulk into a thick mist and, funneled herself and Floatzel into Lugia's open maw.

Lugia wanted to sit back and enjoy this swift expansion, but with Groudon emerging from the earth itself being a potential threat, he had to keep focused, but that still couldn't prevent him from giving off a stupid grin of pleasure.

"Don't get used to this kind of treatment" Floatzel reminded him

"Right" Lugia said as he shook his head, as the last of the mist that was Valerie and Floatzel poured into Lugias stomach, reforming, to join Luxray and Charos. As they reformed back onto a solid state, for some reason both Valerie and Floatzel unmerged, Leaving Floatzel the same size as Luxray, whereas Valerie was more closer to Charos size.

"Wait, why did we unmerge?" Floatzel replied in shock

"Not sure, but just shooting in the dark, the sea water probably has something to do with it as well as our size, I'm sure once our bodies get used to being this big again we'll be right." Valerie suggested

"I hope so" Floatzel said

Meanwhile Lugia watched as Groudon continued for force his way to the surface, eating the ground around him to help. But as he got bigger and pushed his way closer to the surface, Lugia noticed that it wasn't Groudon at all, but instead it was a massive Arcanine, which only served to confuse Lugia even more, since he could definitely sense groudons presence. That's when it dawned on him. This Arcanine had probably devoured Groudon, and the two were working together much like how he, Luxray, Charos, Floatzel and Valerie were.

In one sudden burst, the Arcanine caused an eruption of lava from beneath him to push himself to the surface, his size literally rivaling that of Lugia's. Lugia finally got a good look at the Arcanine, and on closer inspection, both the Arcanine and the Groudon were merged as one, the Arcanine wearing Groudon's scales as some sort of armor, and unlike most Arcanines whom sported a black stomach, this Arcanines stomach matched its face and tail fur, being a light cream color.

"Lugia! Yet again the feast has begun!" Groudons voice boomed "And you've fattened yourself up quite nicely for me, as I do enjoy "Foie gras a la Lugia" you see"

Lugia simply growled at such a comment

"That does sound wonderful" The Arcanine replied back "When do we eat?"

"No need to be so hasty" Groudon replied "You see I'd hate for you to eat a meal that isn't even cooked properly."

"How did you even get to that size?" Lugia interrupted

"The Lava" Groudon replied flatly "For your ocean of water, above, there was an equivalent ocean of lava below"

As Groudon spoke, the Arcanines stomach began to churn and swell. From what Lugia could gather, Groudon was powering up the Arcanine by pumping even more lava into the Arcanines belly

"After we are done with you Lugia, the two of us will devour the rest of this world" Groudon declared

"And from there I, 'Fenrir' will live up to my name and devour the sun itself, but not just this sun, every single sun in the universe" The Arcanine declared, as Groudon continued to pump him up with more and more lava.
11111111111121211121122.title: Something HUGE erupts from the world's core...

choices: Watch as Lyssa eats up the entire region of Johto.
Floaty & Valerie come out from Lugia, and engage Lyssa to join their ranks.
111111111111212111211222.content:
" -URRRRRRPPPP- That went down fin-tastic! Never have I felt so huge in my entire life!"

Beside Miltank was a similarly enlarged Lapras, her rolls upon rolls of underbelly easily smothering the region of Kanto below. She had just finished her personal task of 'uniting' the Pokemon on the job of protecting the region, her belly completely full of blobs of all sizes, from houses to cities.

The Lapras' long neck was also thickly clad in blubber like the rest of her body, giving it the appearance similar to that of a children's stacking toy.

Letting out a well-deserved belch that caused quite an earthquake, she managed to catch the attention of Miltank through the air as well as jiggling their blubbery bodies.

"Hey, didn't notice you there, was too busy downing that massive fish. When did you get here?" The Miltank shouted in surprise at the newcomer.

"Hahahaha, it seems I finally caught up to you, o big bovine. -URP- Excuse me!" The Lapras grinned back at the Cow Pokemon. "I was just watching you take on all the Pokemon earlier all by yourself, so I thought I could do it too!" she continued, confidently.

"I-is that so...Actually I was just going to take a short break. That Swampert tired me out." Miltank sighed.

"Oh, I'm so sorry to disturb your rest!" The Lapras said, flushing red.

"Nah, it's okay. I have to be on my guard anyways." Miltank replied, as she brushed aside a faceful of Lugia tail.

"Say, my name's Lyssa! One of Lorelei's champions in the Kanto Elite Four! Or, at least used to be. What's your name?"

"Eh, I don't exactly have one. My trainer June just calls me Miltank, as do my other friends. There was also another name given to me recently, 'S.S. Moomil', but that's largely defunct now."

"That's no good! Even if you aren't as majestic as a Lapras like I am, a fine lady like you deserves a name to go by!" Lyssa said, in a serious tone.

"Okay...what would you call me then?"

"Say, um..." Lyssa paused, as she took a good hard look at the Cow Pokemon.

"M...Mari? How's that sound?" the Lapras stammered.

"Mari...a short simple two syllables. I'll take it." the Miltank smiled.

"Terrific! Congrats on getting a name, Mari!" Lyssa exclaimed.

"Ohkay...now back to business. While we were busy the ocean just turned into a strange colour-changing blubber mass. What do?"

"Aaah! That's tragic. It would seem we are way behind, what kind of resistance can we put up against that thing..no, TWO things of that size?!" Lyssa groaned.

"This won't do, we'll be gobbled up the moment they turn their attention to us! I think we should...increase our odds..." the Lapras said, as she turned her head around to face the neighbouring region of Johto, her frame easily dwarfing the tallest buildings.

"Whoa, hang on a second! I thought we were supposed to be protecting the regions!" Miltank yelled.

"This region is unprotected, and I don't have enough fat to spread around for it." Lyssa replied, as she gazed upon the region below, laden with countless blobs of Pokemon, none of which are any larger than a city block. "I get more coverage in the end when I eat it all up, plus...Johto'll be much better off in my belly..." the Lapras said with her maw wide open, her drool flowing onto the region like a waterfall.

"I...I suppose that makes sense..." Miltank rolled her eyes.

"So, are you going for it? Sinnoh? That region below you?" Lyssa said, whilst making up her mind on which skyscraper should she swallow first.

"Geez, Lyssa- I'm sitting on Hoenn right now. Sinnoh's being handled by...my trainer..."

"She's not doing a very good job now on her own is she?" Lyssa slurped up her drool, while rubbing her belly with a front fin.

"That's because she is on her own! She got turned into a...Slyveon, I think, to join us." Miltank said, taking sight of a pink coloured blob smothering the port of Snowpoint, who let out a soft burp soon after.

"She'd better pick up the pace, or I might have Sinnoh, along with her for dessert after!" the Lapras chuckled.

"Or you could just, pretty please, help her out. I can't do anything from where I am right now." Mari begged.

"Ah, perhaps when I'm done with this second course here..." Lyssa dismissed, as she took a mouthful of skyscraper, it making a noticable bulge in her blubber-clad neck as she swallowed it down.
111111111111212111211222.title: Enter Lyssa the Lapras!

choices: Lyssa feeds/shoves the region of Sinnoh down June's throat.
Mari gets attacked, forcing Lyssa to stay and defend.
1111111111112121112112221.content:
*BURP* "If a mouthful of city was this delicious, why didn't I think to start earlier?!" Lyssa thought, as she licked off some ruined buildings off her chins like stray crumbs, before continuing to munch on more. As the queen-sized Lapras (though puny in comparison with Lugia over there, who was battling the Arcanine-Groudon monstrosity known as Fenrir, the two parties being at a deadlock with a clashed Hydro Pump and Solarbeam.) devoured the region below her, leaving voids in the earth where cities once stood, she was being offered a great belly rub as well, what with her expanding underbelly rolling in like an ocean tide as she packed on the tons.

"Umph..." the Lapras murred softly as her underbelly moved in to occupy the spaces. Lyssa's ensuing pleasure drove her to eat up the region of Johto even quicker, advancing from eating a city block at a time to trying to fit an entire city in a ridiculously stretched maw of hers. "Strange, I feel kind of full already." She mused, quarterway into the region when she felt her belly gurgle in slight protest.

Taking her attention away from the semi-eaten region, she turned towards her Miltank friend, Mari, who was still loafing on the region of Hoenn, her enlarged butt and enormous flabby belly engulfing the land mass below. "Say, Mari, I hope you haven't dozed off just yet!" Lyssa shouted, trying to hide her mild displeasure.

"No way Lyssa, I'm still trying to digest this huge fish over here." Miltank replied, as she smacked her belly with a front hoove, hearing the remains of that Swampert she ate slosh loudly within. "Well, I know it's only been ten minutes or so since we met, but as a friend, I'd say you go for it, Mari!" the Lapras shouted back, before she made the Tin and Burnt Towers disappear at once into her belly. "Seriously, oh, I suppose I could...one of my four stomachs does feel sorta empty..."

"F-four stomachs?! Did I hear wrongly?"

"No wait, make that two now. Moooaarr..." Miltank felt her belly grumble as one stomach full of digested Swampert emptied, before murring in pleasure as it quickly transformed into more fat, smothering the remaining part of Hoenn as far as her eyes could see with more of her delightful blubber. "Oh no, I better get to it before my body covers it all." the Cow Pokemon said worriedly, as she shifted her body around, getting in position to graze on Hoenn. "I won't *crunch* lose to you Lyssa! Not once have I lost an eating contest June brought me to! A pack of Snorlax, the largest Swalot, and even a Wailord *burp* I have all brought to shame!" she claimed proudly.

"I'll have to thank you for giving me the head start, then!" Lyssa grinned, hoisting the remaining half of Johto up high as she brought her head upright, the land tightly clenched in her jaws.

*CRACKACOOOM!* Went a deafening cracking noise below the Lapras' underbelly, sending shockwaves pulsing through her colossal body, making for a tintillating massage. "Did eyth mreak ze schkale I was loungingh on sho quickly?" (Did I break the scale I was lounging on so quickly?) she mumbled, as she struggled with her mouth full, then proceeding to fold the region into half so she could vore it all down in one gulp. She could feel her neck and throat straining against the sheer weight of the remaining Johto region, as well as the dream-like sensation of an entire half continent forcing down her throat making a significant bulge. The heavy feeling of the land mass weighing down on her stomach wall soon sent her peristalsis into overdrive, and it entered her digestive system double time, her belly now swollen enough to push her four fins off Kanto below her.

A final series of continental cracking caused by the Lapras' greatly increased mass soon spelled its end, leaving no more than a crumbled, broken region crushed beneath her truly glorious underbelly.

" *BUUURRRRPPP* This just keeps getting better and better..." Lyssa belched, as she laid down her head and neck against the grey flab of Lugia's for a break. "Don't stop eating my dear Mari, this, I believe, to be only the start of a great feast." she sighed, defeated but happy.

"What are you doing? You had a job, S.S. Moomil. why are you turning your back on us now!" the steward shouted over the communications system. "There isn't any more hope now. It's either us or them, and I chose Lyssa and myself. Goodbye. It has been an honour to serve you." Miltank said, as she finally slurped up the derelict mass of the former S.S. Moomil's cruise installations, along with her headset, cutting off ties with the cruise company forever.

"I've been waiting to do that, it made it so much sweeter." Miltank smiled, before scoring a nearby beach area into her waiting stomachs. "I'll *huff* leave Kanto to you, if that's okay." Lyssa said, catching her breath. "You said something about..helping your trainer?" "Why yes, pretty please! Thanks a ton!" "I'll see what I can do then!" Lyssa exclaimed, moving slowly but stately towards Sinnoh, where Sylveon-June grew a lot more visible since her last gaze, but was still frantically munching on things to catch up to the oversized duo.
1111111111112121112112221.title: A Broken World of Eats About

choices: Lugia and co. are unable to fight Fenrir head on, and they retreat...
11111111111121211121122211.content:
"Geez, this is gonna take forever..." June groaned, as she finished off that buffet restaurant she ate at much earlier, her butt n' belly now covering the (former) port of Snowpoint.

"Yaho!" Lyssa boomed as she made herself known to the Slyveon hybrid. "Wha-" June almost let out a scream, before the Lapras' neck fat smooshed against her own maw.

"Mari was right, you're such a little adorable wuddly thing!" Lyssa squealed as she embraced June. "Mari who?" June let slip those words, still a little terrified of the massive Pokemon. "Ah, that Miltank I met earlier, she said you were her trainer, yes? But why are you so...'Pokemon'? You even smell like one!" Lyssa wondered. "There was this experiment I willingly participated in...I still happen to be human in more ways than one!" June grinned, as she wiggled her voluminous body, causing her ridiculously huge breasts to sway.

"Who are you anyway?" June asked. "Oh I'm- I'm Lyssa! I made friends with your Miltank, and she sent me here to help you." The Lapras frowned, looking down upon the Slyveon hybrid, a tad jealous of her assets, despite being so much larger herself.
"Pleased to meet you Lyssa. Hopefully you won't see me as a tasty pink snack or anything!" June responded, feeling awkward. "T- That was not my intent at all!" Lyssa blushed, turning her head away. "Right, you said that you were here to help me out! When do we *gulp* start?" June muttered in between feasting on another crushed building.

"At once? Please open wide then, June!" Lyssa declared. "Dish ohkay?" June muffled, her maw as wide open as she could. "Let's bring you up to speed, little sprout." Lyssa thought. The Lapras then lowered her maw into close contact with June's, before gagging once and regurgitating the partially digested remains of her continental meal into the waiting Slyveon hybrid. "What the- Oh!" June was shocked at first, her eyes wide open as Lyssa poured it down her throat like a raging river, before she began to realise her intent and dimming her eyes to enjoy the free meal. Her fluffy pastel belly began to balloon out rapidly, from an initial mere half a kilometre to 5, 10, 15...overtaking her already ridiculous chestline and crushing the next nearby city blocks.

"Ack, *cough cough*" June coughed, taken surprise by the rapid influx of food from Lyssa, as well as her belly feeling a lot more taut. "Did I overdo it?" Lyssa paused her feeding to show concern. "No, you...didn't...my belly just went from E to F and way beyond, so..." June groaned, as she rubbed her enlarged belly.

"I see! Let me know when you want the next course- but don't wait too long or it'll permanently become a part of me!" Lyssa joked, as she took a great big bite out of the region. "Mmph..." June murred in pleasure as her stomach got used to the wide load. Gradually her belly shrank as it digested the remains, padding her body with much deserved blubber all around, though it mostly went into her chest and butt, allowing her enormous, fluffy mammaries to once again take the leas as they grew larger than a mountain each.

The Slyveon hybrid let her blooming chest weigh her body down, causing it to flow into the landscape below her, better suiting the shift in her body's mass. (Along with the fact that there was someone around to feed her, so she needn't be in the position to do so herself.) With her front body now in intimate contact with the disturbed region, smothering it with lovely, fuzzy flab. "Dive bomb!" June's Slyveon yelped, as he plummeted face down into her soft chest, allowing himself to sink in like an oversized mattress. "Nngh you little- ah well..." she let the fact that she was a bed to her Pokemon quite literally sink in, continuing to enjoy the sensation of her body packing on ton after ton.

"Coming through! Ooof!" Mari yelled, as she slid down the ocean of fat and colliding with Lyssa's enormous butt. "Since when were you here- my, you've grown huge!" The Lapras exclaimed at the Cow Pokemon's newfound size. "I thought I'd never say this, but I couldn't eat another bite...*URRRPPPP* excuse me, maybe another island more perhaps." Mari chuckled. "Needless to say I took care of Hoenn there!" the Miltank said triumphantly, as she allowed herself to flow around Lyssa's backside.

"Oh, June, to think you were as skinny as a string bean back then!" Mari cooed, as she finally came face to face with her trainer. "I'm glad I found you again, Miltank, but please lay off the hugs, I had enough for today!" June said, a little peeved. "I hope Lyssa here has been doing a good job." Mari said, whilst starting at the Lapras. "I was just waiting for the missy to finish digesting," Lyssa nods. "All right I'm ready for the next round!" June called out, Lyssa instinctively continued feeding her. "So that's how you're spoiling my trainer eh? Me next if you don't mind!" Mari called out, and they both continued to eagerly shovel treats into the ever larger Slyveon hybrid...
11111111111121211121122211.title: Feeding Time for June

choices: Follow Charos and the others as they escape into another galaxy...
Fenrir dukes it out with Victini, but they end up joining forces!
111111111111212111211222111.content:
"I must say, this is getting a little hot, even for me!" Lugia informed them mentally. as Fenrir continued to radiate heat, instantly liquifying or vaporising anything else in the near vicinity. "We'll cool it off Lugia! Just get back in and shield us all." Floaty replied from within his belly, and Lugia allowed the both lovers to manifest in his current position. Once they had fully formed, the Vaporeon Floatzel fusion shot out a tsunami of a Hydro Pump to douse the invader. Fenrir was supposedly stunned by the attack, flinching for a couple of seconds, before boiling away the water into an enormous cloud of steam, shooting out from his volcano shaped vents on his skin. "No amount of water we have...is going to work..." said Valerie, worriedly, as she witnessed their supposedly effective attack easily shrugged off.

"Mother? Is that you along with Dad?" The Slyveon squinted, gazing upon the ocean blue mass they were all on. June and the others nearby couldn't hear him, as they were too busy feeding. "It seems someone related to you both is calling out." Charos said, as he detected the voice. "A little busy right now!" Floaty said as he countered a stream of lava from Fenrir. "It seems important. I'll let you commune with him telepathically." the Shadow Lugia closed his eyes, connecting Slyveon, Valerie and Floaty on a mental level.

"This can't be, you're one of our children!" Floaty said, shocked. "I was wondering where you ran off to, ya little rascal. Had enough fun yet?" Valerie mused. "Ah, but I did. June is a nice trainer, but it seems that wherever I go, I can never escape the grasp of this fat phenomenon. Where are the others?"

It was then something struck Valerie as amiss.

"My children...your brothers and sisters...I forgot all about them...I am sorry!" Valerie said, weeping. "That's...No turning back the clock now, Mother." the Slyveon said, whilst shedding a tear. "W-what should I do...how could I be so careless..." "I have met June and the others, and they have been like a family to me. But it won't be for long unless you come and save us. That thing...is looming ever closer." Slyveon said, pointing towards Fenrir.

"Pack up! It's a fool's errand to fight Fenrir, he is wearing us thin." Charos interrupted, alerting them to the criticality of the present. "And just where will we go?" Lugia said, puzzled. "Somewhere far away where we can rest and prepare. Trust me."
"Just a sec, I need to pickup someone!" Valerie shouted, as she turned her body to face Lyssa, Mari, Slyveon June and Slyveon himself. "All of you need to get in right now! No time to waste!" Valerie said, as she opened her mouth wide to swallow them all whole, fat Pokemon, half eaten Sinnoh and all. "Brace yourself!" Charos yelled, as a purple bubble encapsulated their form, and vanished them in a puff of shadowy smoke.

Fenrir was then left alone with the remains of the Pokemon world.
"They are not as foolish as they seem." said Groudon. "No matter. They have only delayed their inevitable fate. All of existence shall be ours!" roared the Arcanine, turning the remains of the tattered world as well as its moon molten, before absorbing it into their form.

"The sun has provided us with much power to fight them, now that it has outlived its usefulness, let's make it a part of us!" roared Groudon as Fenrir began to siphon the great ball of fire into them too.

"Hey, don't you think you're kinda getting in the way here?!"

"Identify yourself!" Fenrir commanded.

"The name's Victini, and you're stealing my star here. Begone or be ash!"

"We are the embodiment of fire, there is nothing you can do to burn us any further. You cannot overcome us!" Fenrir roared.
111111111111212111211222111.title: Mighty Opponent Fenrir

1111111111112121112112221112.content:
"Embodiment of fire?" Victini scoffed "You're fire is merely a weak candle flame, where as my power is an infinite burning supernova"

"If you are so confident that you can put me out, by all means try" Fenrir retorted, as he mockingly let out a loud yawn.

Victini grinned at the Arcanine/Groudon hybrid, his confidence burning as bright as the star he wished to consume, the V shaped crest on his forehead began to glow a bright hot orange, suddenly with a blink of the eye he had tackled the bloated giant of an arcanine, square in the stomach.

"V-CREATE" Victini shouted, as his head sunk into Fenrir's massive bulk of a stomach. Before he could even begin to react, his entire body was engulfed in a giant pillar of flames, that far surpassed the sun itself. "Hot enough for ya?" Victini laughed, but so too did Fenrir.

"This is nice, very nice" The Arcanine growled contently, as his body began to suck up the flames, his body expanding at a steady rate to accommodate for the newly acquired fire power.

"Oh crap, I forgot, that some fire type Pokemon have the ability to suck up flames." Victini thought to himself, as the last thing he wanted to do was to help a powerful foe, get even more powerful... or was it?

"With his ability to absorb and become stronger from fire and my infinite firepower combined, we could easily defeat everything that stands in our way... Even Arceus would be bowing to our power" Victini pondered as he pulled himself out from the Arcanines gut and flew up to speak with him face to face.

"Aww is that all you've got?" Fenrir taunted. "I was beginning to feel a little bit warm too"

"Hah, Hardly. My Power is INFINITE" Victini boasted. "But I have a proposition for you!"

"Oh?" The Arcanine pondered, as he perked up an ear in curiousity.

"Much like how Groudon has merged with you, I too want think it would be in our best interests if we also merge into one being."

"How do you figure that?" Groudon chimed in.

"Think about it for a second, that Arcanine you're merged with has the ability to absorb fire, enhance it and convert it into raw energy... or rather extra fat in this case. Of course normally I can usually do damage to Pokemon regardless of that ability, But you've given him a lot of protection, he can just guzzle down my fire like its nothing. So I figure, let him feed."

"That's all very well and good" Groudon said "But what do you get out of it? What's in it for you?"

"Victory over existence itself" Victini declared. "I can give you the power to consume existence itself without opposition and I too get to feast on existence alongside you."

"And that's it?" Fenrir asked

"Yep, that's it" Victini replied "As long as victory is within our grasp, my power is yours to use as you see fit."

"Groudon, what do you think?" Fenrir asked

"I am willing to allow this alliance, it is in our best interests, and I will keep him in check should he deviate from our desires" Groudon replied

"Well then Victini, Welcome to the team." Fenrir announced. "Though... how exactly are we going to merge?"

"Eat him" Groudon announced.

"Oh, yeah, obviously" Fenrir dumbly laughed.

Victini was reluctant at first, to allow himself to be eaten, especially since he still had memories of Floatzel guzzling him down and digesting him, but it was a small sacrifice for a greater victory, he inched his way towards the Arcanines mouth.

"Please don't slobber on me too much, okay" He sighed, Fenrir opened his maw as wide as he could to allow Victini to jump in, he slid down the Arcanines throat and landed in his stomach with a subtle plop.

Fenrir could already begin to feel his internal flames burning brighter and more stronger due to Victini's influence, he also grew a pair of simple looking wings, on his backside, very much similar to the ones on Victini's back, but the most notable change was a giant V shape marking that was stamped on his chest, that glowed a warm orange.

"Look like the merging is complete" Victini announced from deep inside the Arcanines stomach. "Now get on with the feasting there buddy, I still want to eat that sun!"

Fenrir didn't need to be told twice, he dove headfirst into that sun, like it was the end of worlds (which it was) and began sucking it up into the hungry void that was his stomach, where an eager Victini was ready to share in on the feast.

"More power" Fenrir rumbled to himself as his entire body expanded with each and every gulp of the suns energy.

This was Fenrir's dream come true, even before he realized it possible for Pokemon to even become such beastly sizes, he had always day dreamed about becoming as big as he was now and devouring the sun, as such, others nicknamed him Fenrir because of it, a name which he was proud to carry. Never in all his days, did he think that he would ever live up to his name. Until today.

Fenrir guzzled down the last remaining dregs of the sun's energy into himself before letting out a belch that shook the solar system.

"I want more" Fenrir growled, as he stared at the vastness of the solar system that now orbited him "Where to start?"
1111111111112121112112221112.title: Fighting fire with fire.

choices: Fenrir sees their growing mass in space. He decides to put a stop to them.
Arceus appears before both Floaty and Fenrir, beckoning them to stop.
11111111111121211121122211122.content:
"Uuuh...What happened..."

Mari's eyes open. She felt like she was out for hours, perhaps even days. She awoke to see Lyssa and June feasting on a planet that had landed in Floaty/Valerie's stomach. June was about the same size as Lyssa, too, and she wasn't at all the cherry as compared to them last time.

"Oh, you're awake Mari! C'mon, we have quite a lot of catching up to do." Lyssa chirped.

Mari blinked. Were they all in someone else's stomach? She remembered being eaten with the rest of them earlier, but she blacked out midway. Plus there were also two unfamiliar black, blue and white blobs sitting in the other corner of the stomach, none other than Charos, Luxray and Lugia respectively.

"Hurry up Mari! Don't make me keep feeding you like the time you were asleep."

"Oh. right." Mari nodded, and kicked herself off the slimy wall of the stomach. As they were in space now gravity was a lot less, allowing them to move more freely without their titanic weight bogging them down, even without psychic powers and the like. She smooshed softly against the planet and begins devouring it with them.


"Man, why'd you have to pick this place, Charos? We've been drifting for days and we've only stumbled on a couple of planets, all with stars too great to consume." Floaty complained.

"Apologies, I intended for us to land in a faraway sector with a large density of mass, but it seems I may have missed by mark a little bit." Charos replied.

"Well, how long more til we reach? You know that...Fenrir thing is gonna grow and catch up to us sooner or later."

"Fear not, we are light years away. It will take him more than a few hundred stars to be able to touch us at all. This should be enough time for us to bulk up to face him and possible Arceus afterwards, assuming we live. Once we encounter them there will be no turning back."

"I hope you're right then..."

"Naw, cheer up, Floaty! Us getting off our home planet is the beginning towards our greatness!"

Valerie spoke.

"Well, except that time we had Victini to boost us with, taking care of the sun was a piece of cake. Just our luck..."

"Have no fear, I know the cosmos well. We will not be lost." Charos assured.

"Eh? What's a pair of twin Vaporeon tails gonna do? I know it grows with us, but it's grown so fat that it takes two minutes to complete a single paddle!" Floaty fumed.

"Hey, don't forget Charos and I are also pushing us along! Give us some credit at least." said Lugia.


"Hmm, it seems we might need to borrow our friends...Gifts..."

Valerie smiled as she focused her energy, feeling the Lapras within their belly. Lyssa begins to liquefy. She is none too pleased at the situation.

"W-what's happening to me?! Didn't you promise not to digest us?"

"Don't worry, you're just merging with us. You ought to be thankful as this is a VIP seat!" Floaty joked.

The Lapras before long disappears completely into the stomach wall, and Valerie's body (for convenience, since it is mostly her form) begins to mutate. Her miniscule front and hind paws flattened and changed into Lapras fins, and huge ones at that, as they were now able to scale along with her body unlike her paws which were more meant for land. She feels them and gives them a good paddling, and she smiled as their speed greatly increased.

"Whoa, is this...Am I seeing everything you see?" Lyssa resounded in their mind.

"Yep. In exchange for your, uh, fins you get to see and feel everything. You might feel strange so take a while to get used to it." Floaty said.

"Feel free to eat and move around while we're asleep. As long as we're together we can keep moving and eating 24/7!" Valerie smirked.

"Plus, I heard Miltanks have four stomachs, too!"

A little voice chirped in their heads. Valerie grinned as it was none other than Slyveon himself. Her face immediately turned into a frown though.

"But, it might be difficult, she's not a water Pokemon..."

"Give it a try, mother. At least a stomach is something we all share."

Mari soon disappears into her stomach too, leaving June alone to happily savour the planet and a lot more which were lying around. The merged trio could feel their body's belly expanding as the new three stomachs formed, each as spacious as their current one. Lugia and Charos were right below the hole to a new stomach when it formed, and so they fell in, rather disgruntled, but appreciative of the fact it wasn't so cramped any more.

As for Luxray though, he was fast asleep, so he didn't notice anything amiss.

"Oh, what have I exactly become..." Valerie sighed.

"A carrier to us all! We must eat and grow faster than this Fenrir, and this is the only way." Lugia said.

He was right, though. In the weeks ahead they steeled themselves for a non-stop feast, the merged four taking turns moving around and devouring anything they could possibly eat in their path, while the remaining three fed on some of the things they ate...
11111111111121211121122211122.title: Preparations

choices: Floaty goes to show Miltank who's the boss, peacefully or otherwise...
11111111112.content:
"I just...we can't do that." Floatzel sighed, shaking his head. "Since we've been sent back to this world, there have been more than just a few things beneficial to us that weren't there in the previous world. I think Arceus is at work here as always. Surely he would be watching our every move, waiting for us to slip up..."

"So you're afraid of Arceus, is that it? I'm not exactly afraid of him, Floaty."
