"I am...you've seen what happened to Lux over here. We can't afford to lose each other, much less our memories of those precious moments!" Floaty said. "We should just give this new world a chance this time. We're not exactly caught in a war of who's the biggest unlike back then, so we should just sit back and relax, taking in what life has to offer." the river otter admitted.

"I see...I too, think that we were meant for the water, and make sure it stays that way. Floating about in the cosmos doesn't quite cut it, to be honest." Valerie grinned.

"Besides, there's also our children to take care of. We can't throw away their future just for our petty desires." Floatzel commented, gazing upon their children napping on the coast, though some were awake to hear their parents converse.

"As my dear Floaty wishes then. Love you." Valerie took the moment to sneak a quick kiss, before allowing herself to slide down her river otter lover's massive belly, her moist skin oiling the plunge back into the ocean. "In that case, I wanna see how large you can get while working with them, too! Should be interesting to watch their reaction, watching a whole continent move on its own terms and will!" the corpulent Vaporeon chuckled, her belly upright against the air as she floated easily in the sea water.

"That sounds like a plan. I need a break for today. See you in the morning, Val?"

"Nah, I'll probably just sleep in as always. *yawn* You have to work, I have to parent. That makes us kinda even." Valerie replied, before a mighty stroke of her tail propelled her to the coast where their children were, and curling up beside them.

"Good night, Val." Floatzel mumbled, before closing his eyes.


"A little chilly as always, but not as cold as it was last night." Floatzel spoke to himself, headed for Snowpoint with the artic air ruffling his fur.

"Guess we're getting back into the action eh, Floaty?" Luxray said, in an upright canine pose, enjoying the cool breeze and sunrise. "Yep. I'll keep working for as long as I can." Floatzel said confidently. "Did you have something to eat though? It's no good working on an empty stomach." Luxray reminded, taking a bite out of an energy bar that he kept on his vest. "Ah, you remind me! When you're this size, though, you'll be confident with your fat lasting a lifetime that you don't feel the need to eat anymore.."

"That's funny though. I'd thoughta it'd be the reverse. You need lotsa energy to move around, and considering you can eat anything, doesn't your appetite stir in the slightest upon seeing all sorts of things?" Luxray questioned.

"Plus, it'll be bad for business if you end up shrinking instead of growing constantly, too..."

"Well -that- is true, but it seems that edible food still has the greatest appeal in me. 'Inedibles' are second on the list, which is good I suppose. At least it stops me from eating up ports, islands and the like at first sight." Floaty smirked. "That being said, though, I think I'll have breakfast now. Perhaps you should head back into the bridge, Lux."

"Huh? What for?"

"I'm getting a trash container out on my back, and it's huge in comparison to you right now. I don't want to get you crushed..."

"Oh, I see. Catch ya later then." Luxray said, as he picked himself up and walked into the bridge quarters, the door closing behind him as he continued to eat his energy bar.

Moments later, he could hear a loud clang as well as some loud chomping, gulping and gurgling noises coming from the outside. The trash container obscured the frontal bridge windows from what Luxray himself could see, and it wasn't long before the river otter emptied the entire container, and started to chomp on the rusty metal container itself! Luxray cringed a little as he watched him gobble it all up with ease, but also a little fascinated himself. "That's what they keep you for, I suppose...Though I wonder if every Pokemon is capable of that, and just don't know it?" Luxray pondered, putting up a paw to his chin.

"Good morning, S.S. Inflatable. It's good to see you reporting back to work on time." the steward's voice boomed across the bridge's announcement system, as well as Floatzel's own headset.

"Goshdangit! Forgot to turn down the volume after testing again!!" Luxray cowered, his ears ringing while he covered them with his front paws.

"Good morning *urp* Sorry, was just finished with breakfast." Floatzel replied, continuing to paddle as the sight of the Snowpoint port grew larger and larger.

Luxray crawled out of the bridge to avoid the amplified announcement system, and sat down beside Floatzel's chins, which smelt of trash and rot. It wasn't exactly the most comfortable place to be with stench around.

"We have investigated the matter, and unfortunately your predictions were actually correct. There was a strange whirlpool that manifested somewhere near Hoenn, but there were no casualties or other problems reported, thankfully. The company will just be placing you under observation." the steward said, reading some papers.

"That's...good to hear. Could I get a recording of any news programs that covered the whirlpool?" Floatzel requested.

"That can be arranged, after you port and we get you cleaned up, S.S. Inflatable. Your shift doesn't start til 9am."

"Okay then." Floatzel replied, as he slowed his tail spinning, allowing him to fit snugly into the wide berth, the fur at the sides of his belly brushing against concrete.

"I'm also to let you know that an incident put the S.S. Moomil out of action, too, so you'll have to do overtime until we get a proper replacement."

"Aww crap. Didn't think it'll be that bad, sir." Floatzel groaned.

"We're also using her as an exclusive garbage disposal for now, so any trash you have stored on board in the future is going straight to her." the steward coldly announced.

"W-what?! That's- So be it then." Floatzel said, disappointed. "Get me cleaned up then, I want to watch the news soon."

"Roger that. Steward out."

And with the communications cut, the Luxray took the opportunity to head back into the bridge and turn down the speaker volumes...

"This is a little outrageous...first they take away my bonus food supply, then they make me do extra work. I'm gonna have to confront that Miltank sometime when I'm free, and make sure she narrows her intake, or else..." Floatzel fumed.
11111111112.title: Getting big? Well work gets bigger, too...

choices: Valerie becomes obsessed with the feeling of being huge again...
Valerie funnels most of the food she eats as Miltank, into her own stomach.
111111111122.content:
A week later...

"Hey Floaty dear! You're back!" Valerie paddled into the sea, excitedly.

"Hello Val..."

"What's gotten into you? You seem kinda...down..."

"That's because you're right, milady! He's been feeling in the deep down since he went back to work." Luxray's voice boomed from the PA system on board Floatzel.

"W-what could have happened?!"

"It's a long story, really. With your help we could get him back on his feet."


"That Miltank's been taking your food supply away? Tsch, I knew she was no good from day one! I'ma go teach her a le-"

"No! Please don't do that, Val." Floatzel pleaded.

"I understand that you both are co-workers, but, you see, this is why you get pushed around so easily..."

"He's right, actually. They're gonna be making that cow into an island of some sorts, since she took up the coast of Slateport and isn't moving anywhere around fast, they decided to make her a tad more useful. Building towns and stuff on her."

"Unbelievable. So Floaty doesn't get to be one too? Is that it?" Valerie fumed.

"Don't go about feeding him though. They'd know. Something about sensors and some technobabble." Luxray sighed.

"So I gotta preserve your image too, hmm? This is troublesome...Aha!" Feeling an idea springing to her head, she dived straight down, swimming away from the coast.

"Val, where are you going?" Floatzel wondered.

"Take a good rest, my lovely river otter! I'll have a gift for you sometime at your workplace."

"Whatever that means..." Luxray shrugged.


"BURRRPPP! Feed me more!"

The Miltank, now having immobilised herself on the coastline of Slateport, was now being converted by the cruise company into a fleshy, Pokemon island of some sorts. Construction sites and cranes adorned nearly about every single massive fat fold of the Cow Pokemon's titanic girth, each fold having enough area to house a city. A multitude of lift shafts attached from the ground clearing in front of her led directly to her maw, constantly bringing in tons of things to consume every so often. It was simply the perfect setup for her to gain, gain, and gain...!

"I can see you're definitely enjoying yourself, S.S. Moomil. You're making great progress." said the steward over the radio.

"Still going strong! Though I have to admit, I'm getting a little sleepy from all that eating. *CHOMP*" said Miltank, as she crunched up another container of garbage and swallowed it, looking up into the night sky."

"Tsk tsk, such an elaborate operation..." mused Valerie, as she swam closer towards the towering Miltank. She dived down deeper so as not to be seen, swimming over to the unilluminated behind of Miltank's.

Valerie then reached out a pudgy paw, making contact with the cow's butt. "Let's see if this works...Oh yes."

The Vaporeon slowly melds into Miltank, leaving only her huge belly and what's below it floating in the water, attached to the Miltank.

Successfully tapping into that of Miltank's consciousness, Valerie slowly begins to also sense what the Cow Pokemon was experiencing. Sight was the first to come in, with her looking upon a huge round mountain of white, black spotted lard, and a couple of rail structures bound to it. Her feel of touch then kicked in, and it was simply overwhelming, due to the construction works constantly brushing her fur throughout as they worked.

"Mmph..." Valerie moaned deeply, as she felt the ecstasy almost overwhelm her. She could control it, but having this much hit her in such a short timeframe was unusual even for her.

"You're mine now, let's put you to sleep for the time being. At least until I've sought revenge for Floaty." With that said, Valerie mentally knocks the Miltank out, and takes the reins of control of her body, allowing her to experience everything.

"S.S. Moomil? Have you fallen asleep?" the steward's voice echoed through the headset as Miltank closed her eyes. The trains that were bringing in food then stopped in turn.

"Hmm? No, I was just basking in the light, the floodlight!" Valerie coolly replied (albeit in Miltank's voice).

"Let's continue to get you all fed then." The trains then resume their course, bringing another container to her face. She chomps it and swallows it with ease, feeling it only have a tiny, tingling effect when it hit her enormous stomach.

"She hasn't grown that big, has she? Even that would somewhat fill me up on my current size...On the bright side, her body is fully prepped to take more than this in."

"Maybe...I could use some more! *urp* Because that felt like a little peanut to me. Make them go faster." Valerie said confidently.

"I'm going to savour this, being fattened by humans to become one of their cities...Floaty would definitely want a piece of this. I musn't be selfish, I musn't..."
111111111122.title: Leave it to Valerie.

choices: She detaches from Miltank, going back to Floaty to comfort him.
She takes over Miltank, and warns the cruise company to not push Floaty around.
1111111111221.content:
"Ahhh...I can't....It's way too good..Mmmm..."

Valerie was unable to resist the wonderful feeling of a city being built atop her, and the humans being at her beck and call when it comes to food. Sure enough it wasn't her own body, but she could feel it in every single way Miltank normally could, from the churns in her tummy, her belly stretching along the entire landscape as it grew, and the waves that constantly crashed against her butt cooling it down. Not to mention the tightness of the city constructions and that huge ass udder, too. Valerie could swear that she felt herself let out rivers of milk whenever there was a growth spurt.


A week passes, and Miltank's body surpasses one mile wide. Valerie had not returned to Floaty so he got worried, and he started taking care of their children during work in her absence. It got even tougher for him. Indeed, in Valerie's neglect he had descended into a living hell, while she got to enjoy absolute heaven.


It was the big day. Having reached the size quota and the city was built, the first ever Pokemon floating city was ready to go. The Miltank was now a white and black blob dwarfing the entire town of Slateport and then some, with five miles of pure blubber extending in every direction, with one mile of udder extending in front of her belly. City structures like skyscrapers were riddled all across her landform body, covering the top half while leaving the below half free for the ocean. Hundreds of ships all gathered behind her butt, tethering cables to it and pulling her slowly into the ocean.

Floaty watched all this happen with the rest of his children on board. His jealousy was at its peak, along with his anger. Valerie had promised him a solution, and she had not been sighted for a month since announcing it, even leaving their children behind. Where had she gone? And that Miltank managed to reach city status too, while he was still a measly cruise ship. The company was screwing him over real bad, and he hated it all.

"Oh yeah, about time."

Valerie commented as right after the briefing she was being hauled out to sea, feeling her butt inch slowly into the cool water. She could have easily usurped the Miltank's position and claimed the city for her own enjoyment as well as getting into the ocean faster, but she didn't want to alarm them. It was quite a charade that had gone for quite a long while, the humans not suspecting that she had latched on and took Miltank's place all this while.

As her butt landed in the ocean it got easier for them to pull her. Her body bobbed up and down as it tried to stay afloat with the city on top, and it soon did as they expected. It was quite a roaring success!

"WOW. They're not that stupid in that aspect." Valerie mused. She looked around as much as she could, enjoying the cool sea breeze, the salty air and the white clouds in the sky. It was then she spotted Floaty watching in the distance. Crap! Had it really been that long? Valerie had completely lost track of time and forgotten about Floaty and her children. He must be raging mad now, she thought. She would have to do something to remedy the situation.
1111111111221.title: Getting Carried Away

choices: Lugia rose out from beneath the waves
1111111121.content:
(Note: This chapter takes place after the events that occurred in https://www.writing.com/main/interact/it...)

As Floaty and Valerie drifted near the shore of the secluded Island they and their children live, he feared that the storm was fast approaching. The clouds were growing dark and dropping from their usual place down low ominously, the air was growing colder, and the temperature of the currents was changing. Above all, this meant a potential end for his new home. An end to his family and a return to endlessly glutting away on galaxy sized meals. It was tempting to return to his past life, but he had responsibilities as a husband and a father.

Besides, he loved his family, and was willing to give this new world a chance. He supposed if worst came to worst and Lugia or some other Pokemon did drink the ocean, he could just head over into one of their rolls of flab and bum around with his family for a few months. Maybe take that post his dad offered him as a mineral diver. Oh gods, what a dilemma.

However, at least for now, Floaty could take solace in the fact that his wife, Valerie, and his kids were safe and sound on the island of which he was rapidly approaching.

Floaty waddled his legs across the soft sandy slope of the island, before sitting his rump down on the beach where his kids were napping. Letting his legs rest weightlessly in the water, he leaned onto his back to relax. A few of the children woke up to Floaty's form crashing right up against them and snuggled up a bit into their father's fat folds. Floaty smiled, but he couldn't help but feel worried about tonight. As promised, Floaty and Valerie kept their end of the bargain and had promised to stay on their secluded little island for the night of the storm. But what if Lugia didn't? What if Lugia turned their backs on everyone and repeated the same events that happened before?

Floaty didn't honestly trust Lugia. Sure, he said he was sorry about eating the whole Earth thing, but he said so casually and so forcefully as if he didn't want to say that Floaty had a hard time knowing he was out there in the deep blue. Most of all, he could expect Lugia to always be secretive about his actions. He hadn't heard from Lugia in forever, and now he finally made contact with them, and he tells Floaty and Valerie to stay away from the whirlpool. But how does Floaty know that he just wants them out of the way for when what happens?

"So distrustful, Floaty. That actually hurts my feelings, you know." A voice in Floaty's head teased.

"Huh?" Floaty cocked his head around like an owl, wondering where the voice came from.

He was about to ask Valerie and the kids if they heard that, when all of the sudden, the sound of splashing water snapped him out of his thoughts. He hoisted his large body upwards as to see what was going on.
1111111121.title: Or even Lugia?

choices: Some Other Pokemon Gets Caught In The Whirlpool!
11111111211.content:
The Sea God Pokemon Lugia rose from from the splashing waves in front of the beach where Floaty, Valerie and their children were playing and resting, in all his lardy, blubbery visage. The bloated legendary Pokemon looked down at the equally bloated Floatzel with a teasing smile. "I'm honestly surprised that you put so little stock in my words, Floaty." He smirked.

"L-lugia!" Floaty exclaimed as the massive Pokemon waddled his way towards the beach where he family was playing, each foot fall shaking the sand and earth with his immense weight. "What are you doing here?! I thought you-"

"Would be at the whirlpool repeating history?" Lugia interrupted, giving the Floatzel a fake hard time. "Well, it's a funny story, I actually seriously considered it. But I decided that there are more things to life than just eating and getting impossibly fat."

"Hmmn? Oh! Hello Lugia!" Valerie looked up from her children, who were currently playing with her chubby foot paws, to cheerfully greet the Sea God. "This is an unexpected surprise! Floaty, scoot over and make some room for our guest." Floaty's wife commanded, inviting Lugia to come sit down on the sand with them with a wave of her paw. Before Floaty could even protest or get a word in, he found that Lugia did not want to wait for him to make room, and sat in between him and his wife, mushing the three of them together as soft fat collided with more soft fat.

"Woah!" One of the Eeveelution children, a Jolteon Floaty and Valerie named Dynamo, ran around his mother's fat from to see the stranger that had rested his huge rump on their beach. "Mom, Dad, there's someone who's even bigger than you guys!" He smiled wide with a childlike sense of innocence and wonder.

"Hey!" Floaty exclaimed with a small smile at his son. "Are you trying to say that your old man is 'small', shortstuff?" To this, Dynamo just giggled. Valerie and him rarely ever got visitors, so when someone came, it was a big production for the kids. Thankfully, they were all tuckered out from playing all morning and afternoon, and were snoozing against their mother's pillowy, blubbery thigh. Save for Dynamo, who had enough energy to power a city.

Lugia looked down at the small, small Pokemon and smiled with a genuine warmth. "Well, hello there little one." He politely greeted with a smile, making his already huge cheeks laden with fat puff out even more. "My name is Lugia, who are you?"

"My name is Dynamo, and your really fat!" The young Eeveelution bounced up and down on the trampled sand as all three of the obese titans blush at the child's bluntness. Of course, growing up with Valerie and Floaty as parents, Dynamo had grown to believe that being fat was a great thing! You get to be so soft and huge, you could eat whatever you want, and you always gave the best hugs! Thankfully, Lugia was not insulted in the slightest, and actually inflated a little with pride.

"Why yes, yes I am," Lugia chuckled, feeling conscious of his impressive girth. "Thank you for noticing~".

"Daddy, can I play with Mr. Lugia please?" Dynamo turned to his father, who was content watching his son just talk to the legendary bird. He looked over Lugia's fat to see Valerie give a nod of approval, with Lugia himself looking more then happy at the suggestion. So trusting, that women he thought.. Had she forgotten that this was the Pokemon that had tried to turn her and him into more fat by eating them? Nevertheless, he relented. "Sure son, go right ahead."

Dynamo the energetic young Jolteon gave out a cheer of delight and began to run towards the incredibly fat stranger that was sitting between his parents. He crashed heavily into Lugia’s gigantic mound of belly paunch, making it jiggle and quiver like crazy, and promptly nuzzled, cuddled, snuggled and groped the downy blubber in between his paws.

Lugia, Happy to have the electric type eeveelution play with him, gave out a low putt of delight as the small thing rubbed his entire body into his fat. “Mrrrr...this is what I was talking about Floaty.”

“H-huh?” Floaty asked, taken aback by the question. He wasn't really paying attention to the scene.

“This,” Lugia gestured to Floaty’s son currently trying to climb the blue surface of his stomach like it was a mountain, which would not be an inaccurate description, “Is why I don’t wanna try to eat the world. Ever since Arceus gave us all a second chance, I’ve begun to truly experience life in all its majesty. Like the setting sun,” the legendary bird pointed to the beautiful scene in front of the trio.

“Or the innocence of a child~” Lugia cooed as Dynamo continued to climb his stomach like a hillock. His Yellow furred paws sunk knees deep into the cushiony adipose, to which the Jolteon could only laugh and paw at. “You can’t get any of those things if you eat them.”

“So...you have NO interest in trying to eat the world anymore?” Floaty questioned, still not sure whether or not to trust Lugia.

Lugia smiled a big, fat smile and placed a lard laden wing-hand on the back of Floaty’s back. “Not at all, my friend, if I may call you that. I came here to spend some time with the two who I used to consider food, but now see for amazing parents and people. I love being fat, but I think I love life a little more.”

It suddenly dawned on Floaty that, maybe, just perhaps, the old sea bird had changed. They're was a certain type of gleam in his sapphire eyes as he eyed his child bury his little muzzle into his blue belly paunch. There was a newfound appreciation of the little things in the Legendary, the slightly less fat river otter could see that now. He gave a sigh of relief and felt relaxed enough to lay his huge back onto the warn osand of his island home, content to watch the setting sun sink into the ocean and past the horizon.
11111111211.title: Lugia rose out from beneath the waves

choices: Shadow Lugia carries out its plan and drinks the ocean
11111112.content:
"Sir, you'll be pleased to know everything is falling into place, In 2 hours from now, the storm will hit"

"What of "Floatzel" hmm?"

"Lugia has done as we asked, and Floatzel and Valerie have avoided all contact with the storm site and are currently at their home."

"Excellent!"

"I've done as you've asked now let me go!"

"Oh Lugia, you know I can't do that, after all, you're a big part in my master plan"

"You don't know what you're getting yourself into, Arceus is not someone you can simply defeat" Lugia shouted back to his captor

"I am well aware of what happened to you, you've warned me countless times about how Arceus gave you exactly what you wanted..." the voice sighed.

"As some form of ironic punishment for your greed and gluttony, back then you desired a feast of everything and thats what he gave you, he fed you pure creation, and you greedily guzzled it down, growing, expanding and feasting, with each millisecond you would expand trillions of times your already ridiculous size, but after countless millennia of such glory and feasting you got tired, you got bored, it didn't please you anymore, yet Arceus showed you no mercy, this was your wish, and he had no intention of stopping, and you were given no rest... But after a while Arceus got bored of you constantly begging him for forgiveness, and he made you make the same promise that Floatzel, and Luxray and the other Pokemon who were caught up in their greed, and even then he was nice enough to allow you to remain rather... fat."

"And I intend to keep that promise, I will not let my gluttony get the better of me" Lugia growled back

"Sadly you have no say in the matter, you see my body, even if we are separate from one another is connected to yours, If you grow, I grow, and if I grow, so to do you. But we are connected further than that. For you see, I can tell that you regret giving up such a life, you want to let it all go, you want to devour everything, and never stop."

"You're wrong, no matter how much you tempt me I will not give in" Lugia snapped back

"As I said, you really have no say in the matter, your body will return to its former glory in due time, as my body will also achieve such glory, of course I would like you to just give into your true desires, to speed up the process"

"Like I would!" Lugia grunted back

"Well I know you will give in to your greedy ways soon enough, after all I am a connected to you, and I can tell that deep down this is what you crave"

"You're nothing but a mere shadow of me!" Lugia shouted

"Exactly, I am a Shadow Lugia"
11111112.title: Meanwhile elsewhere...

112.content:
This is a summary of the previous parts of the storyline, which have vanished.

Prologue
It all started when a Lugia went out for a swim in the ocean. All of a sudden, he got trapped within a whirlpool that appeared out of nowhere, and the ocean's water got funneled into him, swelling him out like a balloon.

But to his surprise, the whirlpool did not cause him to burst, but rather, caused him to drink up the entire ocean dry without much harm whatsoever. The ocean's Pokemon soon beckoned out to him for their loss of habitat. The crafty, ocean-sized Lugia suggested they all take up residence in his stomach where the ocean once was, and swallowed them with glee.

Whether it was intent or by accident, Lugia's stomach began to digest the entire ocean, and soon the ocean was no more but blubber padded on his once insignifcant body. The legendary Pokemon of each continent soon went after him with the intention of revenge for his crime, but his psychic powers proved too much for them, and they were all defeated - Groudon, in particular, got to enjoy eating cities for a while before being devoured by Lugia, and Rayquaza fired an ill-placed Hyperbeam when he was being swallowed by Lugia, blimping him up to cover the entire surface of the planet, as well as considerably augmenting his powers.


Brief Respite
When the rest of the legendaries came to, they were being imprisoned by Lugia on top of his chins. Only Ho-Oh, Entei, Raikou, Suicune, Moltres, Zapdos and Articuno were left as the others were seemingly eaten by Lugia as snacks. Lugia forced Ho-Oh to swallow Articuno, but the show was interrupted by Victini who happened to pass by to settle the score, challenging him to eat the world - then see who would come out on top.

Despite the size difference between them, Victini felt himself still up to the challenge and attempted to make his way down to the covered world below, but got stuck in between Lugia's butt fat. Lugia dispatched Ho-Oh to seek him out and bring him back to him, which she did, but as Lugia fell asleep, she swallowed Victini herself in a gamble, which worked. Victini performed a V-Generate within her stomach, and the immense amount of energy absorbed by her stomach caused Ho-Oh to put on a massive amount of weight, allowing her to rival Lugia (as well as sending the rest of them flying off in all directions.)

Soon Victini realised that his escape move had backfired, he made his escape by cutting a hole in her stomach and swimming through her newly formed fat. Lugia began to sleep talk in his dream, and Ho-Oh played along, almost scoring him in her stomach without a struggle, but he woke up halfway.

The awakened Lugia realised that she was immobile and therefore no threat, and began to eat the world himself. Ho-Oh, powerless to stop him, got the rest of the legendaries to ally with her to distract Lugia, while she attempted to swallow him by the tail.


Victini makes allies

Victini soon made his way to the surface, and there he met Celebi and a pair of surviving trainers, June and Purple. After unsuccessfully convincing Celebi that he was not out to eat the world himself, Purple captured Celebi himself with the notion that she was a legendary Pokemon - soon realising he had ran out of Pokeballs to catch Victini himself. With Celebi gone, Victini convinced the trainers instead, and managed to get on June's good side, allowing him access to her Miltank.

Victini used the same technique earlier in Ho-Oh to fatten up the Miltank massively, boosting them upwards to the surface and interrupting Lugia and Ho-Oh. Once there he took the Pokeball containing Celebi, and ate the Pokeball. Tricking the scared Celebi into using her powers to escape he managed to gain some considerable weight himself.

The legendaries with Ho-Oh did not give up. They attacked the two trainers on Miltank, and recalled Miltank back into her Pokeball, leaving a great big void below them, with the legendary birds bringing them and the trainers to safety. Lugia and Victini began to continue the feast of the world, but were forced to stop by Ho-Oh's gut expanding to fit the swallowed Pokeball with the Miltank, covering the world and ousting them upwards. Lugia rolled down like a massive boulder, and in the momentum he was swallowed whole by Ho-Oh, giving her two gut-popping continental meals in less than a few minutes. Victini however just managed to hold on, with Ho-Oh herself taunting him.

June sought retribution for her lost Miltank, and tinkered a device that could fire a beam to fatten Pokemon near instantly. Purple then set out his Pokemon to trick Ho-Oh's company into coming to their location, in which June ordered her Clefable to sing, putting them to sleep, then bloating them to immobility with the beam.

Lugia avoided being digested by Ho-Oh with his psychic powers, and tricked her into eating the remains of the planet, inciting the wrath of Unova's legendaries, Reshiram and Zekrom. Zekrom broke Ho-Oh's trance with a lightning bolt, then they set out to find June.

An old friend!

After Ho-Oh was overturned by Lugia upon failure of his plan, Victini landed onto Unova, and was about to get ready for his next meal - until he saw a pair of massive tails coming out from a building in the distance. Victini soon found out that it was his Floatzel friend, Floaty inside, who had taken up residence inside the abandoned shopping complex, and ate his way to bigness, getting himself stuck in the building. After exchanging some friendly banter Victini pulled him out from the building, and has the building for a meal himself much to Floaty's shock.

Floaty soon got over it though, and was beginning to eat supposedly inedible objects with no problems just like his friend. With the aid of Victini he snacked on the ruined Tubeline Bridge, but their reunion was cut short by Lugia, who shifted his weight around and destabilising the region they were on. Floaty and Victini were then seperated.

Floaty himself ended up in a massive cave network, where he got stuck in the entrance. Meeting a lone Drilbur who was tunnelling through, he convinced the mole Pokemon to free him in exchange for some food caught in his chin folds. Once free the Drilbur accompanied the Floatzel, eating ice cream while the river otter chomped away hungrily at the cave rock.


Strange Discovery
As Floaty ate the cave he stumbled upon an underground city. It was ancient in appearance, but massive. Mountains upon mountains of food were piled up there for some strange reason, giving him reason to feast further, but a similarly fat Luxray was already there before him, challenging him to an eating competition.

Floaty himself lost the competition, being devoured by Luxray. However as he went inside, a statue that was trapped in his fat came to life in the damp environment, revealing itself to be a normal-sized Vaporeon. While she was initially scared by the Floatzel's appearance at first, she introduced herself to be Valerie, the greatest Vaporeon who landed the entire world in her belly two centuries ago. She soon convinced Floaty to get her up to speed with regaining her size, and they soon warmed up to each other, becoming (quite massive) lovers.

Using Valerie's abilities they escaped Luxray in a mist, but they ended up conjoined in the same body as they reformed! It was not a setback at all however, as they could easily take turns eating and resting. The shrunked Luxray soon pleaded for his life, but Floaty swallowed him in lieu of his hostility earlier in the city.


The contest continues
Floaty soon came belly to belly with his friend Victini as the Luxray's energy caused his weight to instantly multiply. Valerie overheard their conversation, and it turned out that they were mortal enemies in a previous life as Victini betrayed her, eating her offspring. She took control and confronted Victini, and as he charged a V-Generate and attempted to annihilate the both of them, Luxray intervened, sacrificing his weight to nullify the attack against them. The exhausted Victini soon fell unconscious, and Valerie let Floaty himself do the honours.

The peace did not last long, however. After Valerie took control of their body her tail slammed down on Ho-Oh's belly, causing her to regurgitate Lugia. Once escaped he devoured the dazed Ho-Oh, and challenged Valerie who was just about to resume feasting. Lugia saved Luxray from the Drilbur who devoured him whole by accident, and after force feeding him, made him his champion in a show he would sit back and watch.

Lugia himself soon grew impatient as Valerie began to gain advantage, devouring the both of them and the region itself. The planet was now no more, leaving him floating in space, as well as Zekrom and Reshiram who had escaped to space too after rescuing the trainers in a vessel ship they found in the ancient city.

Luxray, Floaty and Valerie formed an alliance within Lugia's belly, eating everything that Lugia happened to devour. Once they had eaten their fill they made their escape, and the angry Lugia attempted to counterattack, but Valerie shifted their body in a way that made it difficult to swallow. Then something happened...


Lovers' Luck Out
The Victini they swallowed earlier was fully digested leaving a sphere of immense energy in its place, turning everything in their belly into pure energy in the ensuing pyroclasm. The energy was then instantly absorbed into fat on Floaty and Valerie's shared body, engulfing the rest of them within their folds as well as fattening them to the point their tails came into contact with the sun.

Agreeing with each other that their dinner date had truly begun, they took Luxray along as an ally, and began to feast upon a seemingly endless buffet, moving on from stars to entire galaxies...
112.title: Floatzel & Vaporeon - What Happened Before?

choices: Don't add to this. The story continues!
1121.content:
Emergence
Their arch enemy, Lugia, had not left them. After what seemed like months of feasting he rears his ugly head, using his powers to seperate Valerie from Floaty and using her powers to make his escape. Luxray helps out by siphoning some of the mist himself, allowing Valerie to be saved with loss of most of her girth. As Lugia attempts to reform Floatzel eats as fast as he could in the hopes of outsizing him completely, but he manages to reform and takes control of Luxray's mind, causing Valerie to disappear into him. Floaty lets himself be devoured and follows after her.


End of All Things
Floaty and Valerie discover Lugia's plan with the help of surviving Legendary Pokemon inside Luxray's belly. Lugia intended to overload Luxray by forcing him to devour universe upon universe and upon his explosion, funnel all of existence into himself and somehow infinitesmally multiply the mass he would gain, and effectively destroy everyone.

Arceus intervenes, questioning the rest of them, before Floaty poses a burning question: to as whether Arceus himself has planned for additional backup universes. After getting over Floaty's audacity and listening to his request to restore everything to the way it was before, so that Valerie and he can return to start a family, Arceus restarts the universe, and things were seemingly back to normal.

The two lovers bid their goodbye to Luxray.


Back home and living the life

Thanks to his generosity Floaty and Valerie started off slightly larger than a Wailord each along with their memories, with the condition that they did their best to prevent a repeat of the incidents. The two of them soon settled onto a remote island and started a family.


An unexpected cruise career

Floaty's love for eating and growing fatter did not diminish one bit however. After their children were born he took to the seas and simply bobbed around on his huge blubbery body. Cruise ships would come and go as he watched, and he would follow a particular one, devouring garbage as they dumped it every so often.

This soon continued until they noticed the river otter that floated behind them, growing ever bigger from junk they threw away. Over the course of a month he outsized the massive cruise ship himself and owing to customer complaints of scenary being blocked by Floaty, the company had to do something - build a ship out of Floaty himself.

They offered him the cruise ship he followed, to savour all by himself. The river otter fervently chomped at it day and night, with people watching the extraordinary spectacle of the great S.S. Behemoth being decommissioned by the grossly obese Floatzel. After a few days he finished the house-sized rudder of the ship, releasing a long, huge belch from himself as he triumphantly rowed out to the ports.

The cruise company would then construct a full cruise suite adapted for a fat Pokemon such as Floaty, and put him on a lifetime job being a cruise ship, bottomless gourmand for both banquets and refuse alike. The cruise suite, of course, was being constantly refitted as he grew bigger and bigger...


Trouble Returns

Valerie takes their children along and began to follow Floaty around for his escapades. One night though, she questions Floaty on his future with the cruise company, and realises he might be a little too attached to it. The Vaporeon then threatens him, telling him that he should retire and return back home. Floaty manages to reach a compromise with his lover.

Floaty sails back to Snowpoint for repair after the damage Valerie caused. He receives a mental message from Lugia who tells him he should not head out, for the whirlpool that caused the previous events, would manifest tonight. Floaty himself could not find evidence to believe Lugia through the weather channels. The river otter was planning to stay at port until it blowed over, but after seeing the news report that a new cruise ship, based on a Miltank, was heading out, he acted immediately, evacuating everyone on board and heading for Slateport, hoping he would not be too late.

And the story continues from here...

123.content:
Ellie was just an Eevee, in a large plainlands living with her two sisters, Ufie, an Umbreon, and Sylvia, the Sylveon. Sylvia was very kind to Ellie, always playing with her and making her out to be the greatest, but Ufie was very mean to Ellie. Ufie was never the better one, and despised how beloved Ellie was. She wouldn't be so great if she didn't look so cute... That was it. Sylvia and Ellie were cute, and everyone loved them, but Ufie was the Dark one. Nobody could find the Dark Type cute...

That's when Ufie hatched a plan. To make Ellie no longer cute. It was such a cunning plan, all she needed to do was to make Ellie fat. But to do this, she would need some kind of elaborate plot. It would be too obvious and too easy to be caught by simple force-feeding, somehow she had to convince Ellie that gaining weight was good.
That's when it hit her, a new plan that could make the old plan work perfectly! She scampered off, plotting her devious plan.

Soon after, Ellie was frolicking in a field, when Ufie came in, smiling wide.
"Heya, Ufie!" Ellie smiled, "How're you doing?"
"Fine, fine." Ufie responded, "I just wanted to ask..."
123.title: Eevee

choices: Ellie continued to eat more berries that Ufie brought home
Ellie insists that Ufie has some too, refusing to eat unless she does
Ellie says that they should save some for Sylvia
1232.content:
Ufie pulled out a few berries that Ellie had never seen before, "Would you like to try out these new, cool berries I got?" They were fairly large compared to other berries in the area, but what was more odd was the white and yellow stripe pattern they had.

Ellie gasped, excited to try something new. She looked back up at her sister with a smile, "Okay! What are they?"

Honestly, Ufie wasn't certain about the identity of the berries. While she was getting away from Sylvia's usual annoying doting over Ellie, she came across a bush that held this mysterious fruit just sitting there, rather depressingly. It looked like it hadn't received attention in a long time, but fruit was still growing on it rather abundantly. She picked one and took a closer look at it, soon deciding to take a small bite. It tasted oddly creamy for a fruit. Soon after though, Ufie felt pressure building up in her stomach. It was only a little bit, but Ufie had definitely gained weight. Thankfully, no one noticed, so Ufie had forgotten about it for a time.

Ellie took her sister's silence as an 'I don't know' and simply resorted to figure out what these berries were by trying one. She took a small bite, similiar to how Ufie approached the situation, but seemed oblivious to the bloating that the fruit caused. She then ate up the rest of the berry she took a bite out of, and laid back, allowing her belly to expand slowly.

Ufie smiled, believing Ellie was going to keep going with this. She picked up another berry and placed it in front of her, "You want another, sis?" Ellie held a joyful expression at the proposition.

Ellie loved the taste of the berries, and hadn't noticed the obvious gain they were causing. Well, she did notice the weight gain, but never correlated it to the berries.
Ufie continued to bring piles of berries of Ellie to eat, which she did so happily. She was gaining nearly fifty pounds a day, which was good progress.

But as Ufie continued to feed Ellie, she noticed something that really put a damper in her plans. She saw that, despite Ellie being well over 500 pounds, she was still too cute! The fatness seemed to only add on to her adorableness, her fat pudgy cheeks reminding her of a Chipmunk.
Ufie was determined, though. There had to be some point where she would lose that cuteness and the fat would make her ugly.

Ufie and Ellie kept this up for about two more weeks, until...

Honestly, Sylvia was happy as long as her little sister Ellie was happy. But that didn't mean she wasn't concerned for her well-being, because Ellie growing so much in such a short period of time certainly raised some questions. Sylvia didn't think it was too much of a problem since Pokemon don't suffer from weight related health issues, (Hooray for fantasy settings!) but it was still odd. She didn't know what to do about it though, since this was such a strange phenomenon.

Ellie was currently eating more of those berries that Ufie had been bringing home when Sylvia came back with something in tow. Despite having become a blob of an Eevee that you would expect to focus on nothing else when food was in front of her, the sight of Sylvia was always enough to catch her attention. She then nodded, before finishing her thought, "To be honest, I was pretty worried about how much you've grown lately, but I've thought of a way to soothe my mind."

Ellie's belly had gotten so big that it lifted her tiny legs from the ground. She tried to move, but it wasn't happening. She had become immobile. It was bound to happen when you become over half a ton.

125.content: Perhaps a Ninetales or Vulpix?
125.title: Ninetales?

1252.content:
Despite common belief, not all Pokemon were interested in battling. In fact, just like humans, Pokemon had all manner of different dreams and ambitions. You, for one, simply dreamed of winning every Pokemon contest in Kanto! Being a ninetales, you were well known for your beauty, grace and power, and you’ve managed to participate in over a hundred different contests undefeated! Indeed, everyone knew you were the coolest, cutest, toughest, smartest, and most beautiful Pokemon around!

There was only one problem: a new type of competition was getting popular. Eating contests. At first, you loathed them. How crass, you thought! How disgusting! They were all mindless displays of gluttony, devoid of the class and showmanship of true contests. Why would any Pokemon want to get bulky and fat, after all, when they could be gorgeous and sylphlike like you? However, as time went on, people started paying more and more attention these eating contests. They were new! They were novel! And thus, people stopped paying attention to you. The seats at your contests were almost empty. People didn’t consider you the best anymore; they considered you stuck-up and boring.

Well, you weren’t about to be left in the dust! After much deliberation, you’ve decided that if you can’t beat them, you were going to join them. Sure, eating contests might not be within your realm of expertise… but you were certain you could conquer them with the same ease with which you’ve conquered every other type of contest! You had stars in your eyes as you imagined yourself rising to the top of the leaderboard, everyone in Kanto awed by your seemingly limitless skill. Thus, you’ve signed up for your very first eating contest, with even doing any preparation first. I mean, it’s just eating. You eat things all the time. It can’t be that hard, right?

You take your place beside the three other contestants; a nidoqueen, a lopunny, and a delcatty. “Psst. Hey. You don’t happen to be Maura, do you?” The nidoqueen beside you leans over and whispers. She was about a foot taller than you, and looked to be on the plump side.

“Ah! I see my reputation precedes me!” You smile. “Are you a fan? I’d be happy to give you an autograph after the contest.”

“To be honest? I hate your guts. Always prancing around on TV like you’re all that,” she growls. “I’m surprised to see you join an eating contest… but I’m glad you did. I look forward to humiliating you.” She cackled, and you turned your head away in disgust. How incredibly rude! Before you can respond, though, you hear the announcer speaking over the loudspeakers,

“Each contestant will be provided with one hundred hot-dogs! You win by being the first Pokemon to empty your plate!” He explains. “The only rules is that you will not leave your seat until you’ve emptied your plate, you’ll eat the dogs and the buns, and you will not interfere with your contestants in any way. Failure to follow these rules will result in immediate disqualification!” He seems more stern all of a sudden. “There is no time limit. Once the bell rings, the contest does not end until a Pokemon clears their plate.”

You reel back in shock as a ursaring emerged from offstage, and placed a huge plate on the table in front of you, boasting an entire mountain of hot dogs. One hundred? Surely, he can’t be serious! You’ve never eaten half this much in your entire life! You look at the other contestants to see their reactions, only to realize they’re all licking their lips, seemingly delighted by the meal. For the first time, you were starting to think you’re outmatched. “Are you ready?” All your fellow contestants nod eagerly, while you’re filled with nervousness. “Begin!”

To your awe, all the other contestants immediately start chowing down, sending hot dogs down their throats in seconds. Meanwhile, you nervously lift a hot dog to your mouth, trying to swallow it like they do, only to realize you can’t even fit the whole thing in your mouth. You have to chew half of it before swallowing the rest. You hadn’t eaten all day, and still, your hungry was sated by a single hot dog. By the time you reached the fifth one, you were already starting to feel full. To maintain your perfect, skinny figure, you usually didn’t eat much, so your stomach wasn’t used to being stretched out!

By the time you’ve eaten a quarter of the hot dogs on the plate, you already felt like you were about to throw up. You gag as you swallow another one, your belly feeling like it was on the verge of bursting. You try your best to pull through and win this… only to suddenly hear the bell ring again! You almost choke on the bun in your mouth in surprise, as you look over to see the nidoqueen rubbing her full belly, her plate emptied of everything but crumbs. She’d already eaten all 100 hot dogs? How is that even possible? Even the other contests seemed to have mostly cleaned their plates. Your heart sinks as you quietly dread the results…

“Last place!?”

“Well… yeah. You didn’t even manage to eat half of the hot-dogs,” the ursaring who ran the contest shrugged, walking curtly away from you while you followed him around like a puppy. “What did you think was going to happen?”

“I can’t get last place in a contest! I’ve been undefeated for years!” You whimper, panicking. “All my hard work and dedication… down the drain, just like that!”

“Not my problem, lady,” he groans, hoping you’d get the hint to leave him alone.

“Please! There must’ve been some kind of mistak- mph!” The nidoqueen from before was walking by, and while chasing after the ursaring, you accidentally ran into her. You practically bounced off her big, round belly, falling to the ground in front of her.

“Watch where you’re going!” She yells, only to look down and smirk when she realizes it’s you. “Oh! Well, look who it is. The wannabe celebrity again,” she taunts. You see the ursaring hurry out of sight in the background. “Gotta say, that was the most pathetic display I’ve ever seen onstage. I don’t know what you even thought you were doing.”

Your ears flatten against your head. To be honestly, her words stung. A lot. “I… I tried my best…” You whimpered.

“Maybe that’s good enough in your lame ‘beauty contests’, but here, you’re going to have to try harder than that,” the nidoqueen cackled, her stuffed belly jiggling as she bent over so you were at eye-level. “If you want to compete, you better put some meat on your bones. Otherwise, I suggest you don’t show your face around here again.” She laughed loudly as she walked away, leaving you there, miserable and humiliated, humbled by the incessant laughter of the audience...

┄┄┄


Later, you’re sitting at a cafe with your friend Lucian, a mismagius. Neither of you were having anything to eat - you didn’t have much of an appetite at the moment, and Lucian didn’t have a stomach. “Last place! Can you believe it?” You complained, loud enough to bother the other customers. “After all those years, undefeated. My winning streak, gone… over a hot-dog eating competition!”

“I can believe it,” he notes. “I mean, those eating contests look really difficult. If you’re not prepared for them, you’re going to have a bad time.”

“I’m just so used to being good at everything, I’m not accustomed to being so terrible at something.”

“Oh, come on. You’re not terrible, you’re just out of your element,” he reassures you. “I’m not sure why you even tried the whole eating contest thing. They never seemed your style.”

“They’re not, but they’re extremely popular nowadays,” you frown. “Honestly, I never want to go to another one again… but I have to defeat that smug nidoqueen one of these days! My honor depends on it.”

“You know… I could help you practice,” he said with a mischievous grin. You call that Lucian is one of those ‘feeders’ - Pokemon that like helping other Pokemon gain a ton of weight. He’s fattened up plenty of girls you knew over the years, and even asked you a few times, though you’ve always turned him down. You just didn’t see the appeal… and after all, you have to maintain your perfect figure.

“You just want to fatten me up, don’t you?” You glare at him.

“... maybe.” He chuckles, and you roll your eyes, growling at the perverted mismagius. “Don’t look at me like that! Do you want to win or not? ‘Cause if you do, I’m an expert in this sort of thing. I can be your coordinator!”

You consider it. You didn’t want to ruin your figure, but you desperately wanted to defeat that smug nidoqueen. “... alright. You can be my coordinator,” you sigh, “but no pervy stuff! Got it?”

He gets the biggest grin on his face. “I’d never dream of it.”
1252.title: Eating Contest Humiliation

12521.content:
Day 1

The next day, you were visiting Lucian’s apartment, ready to prepare for the next contest. You had had a stomach ache all night as you digested the previous day’s meals, so you were a little bit woozy. You follow dizzily along as the mismagius leads you to the kitchen. “Right, now, before we get started, step on this scale here,” he says, pointing to a high-tech scale in the corner. “Let’s see what we’re working with.” You raise a brow incredulously, but step on the scale anyway, and it beeps as it reads you the results...

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ ━
Current Weight | 39 lbs : Skinny
Yesterday, you gained 1 lb!
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━


“Why does it matter how much weight I gain?” You said, getting a little angry. “Lucian, I said no pervy stuff!”

“Well, think about it!” He shrugs. “What common factor did all the other contestants there share?”

You think about. “They were…” You choose your words carefully, trying not to sound impolite. “... ‘heavy’?”

“They were fat!” He said, frankly, as he digs through his pantry. “And if you want to compete, you have to put some meat on your bones, too. I know you’d like to keep your figure, but you can’t make an omelette without breaking a few eggs, as they say.” You shudder, his words reminding you of what that nidoqueen had said yesterday.

You didn’t want to gain weight… but the weight could be worked off. The shame of losing again, on the other hand would last forever. “Ugh… alright,” you sigh, “but I better win this contest! I’m trusting you, Lucian.”

“Well, I’ll help you the best I can, but winning this sort of contest depends on your dedication,” he smiled, leading you over to the table by the paw. He grinned as he sat you down on a chair. “You gotta be in it to win it! No matter the consequences!”

You huff, grimly. “Let’s just get to the practice.”

You’re surprised as he pulls out a whiteboard, covered in various notes and numbers. “Alright. Now, I looked over the recordings, and that nidoqueen cleaned her plate in 3 minutes and 11 seconds,” he said, gesturing to the board. “There’s another hot dog eating contest in two weeks. To be prepared, you have to have at least beaten her score by then. Otherwise, we might as well just give up on this whole thing.”

“I’d never give up.”

“That’s the spirit!” He chuckled. “Anyway, before we can even get started on practice, we have to answer one simple question; how quickly can you eat one hundred hot dogs?”

Before you knew it, he levitated a huge plate of hotdogs over to you, dropping it on the table before you. You shuddered as you looked at the veritable mountain of sausages. Remembering the stomach ache you got from just eating a quarter of this amount of hot dogs, you immediately feel nauseous. “Oh… dear…” You whimpered. “Do we have to start out with a hundred?”

“We only have two weeks, so our training regimen has to be rigorous,” he says, revealing a little bell. “Now, when I ring the bell, I want you to start eating like your life depends on it! Pretend you’re in a contest, and that snobby nidoqueen is sitting right next to you!” You sigh, getting ready to chow down. Might as well do your best. “Ready? Set? Go!”

This time, you acted without a moment’s hesitation. Now that you knew what you were capable of, you were able to gulp down hot dogs much faster than before. You still had to eat each of them in two bites, of course… but it was something, at least. You devoured the first ten hot dogs with relative ease… but by the time you reached 20, that familiar, full feeling was starting to set in. When you reached 30, you could see the sausages making a visible bulge in your belly, and you were beginning to feel nauseous. By the time you reached 40, you already felt like you were about to throw up. All the while, Lucian watched with an excited grin on his face, enjoying the sight of you stuffing your belly.

On 50, you were panting and coughing, your stomach feeling like it was stretched to capacity. Worse still, after all that eating, you felt like you had barely put a dent in the huge pile. “Lucian... it’s too much…” You whimpered.

“C’mon! Don’t give up! You’re halfway there!” He insisted, but this fails to reassure you. “You’re a champion, Maura! You went undefeated for years! You can do this, just hang in there!” Suddenly, you remember that nasty nidoqueen. She didn’t know a thing about showmanship… about the craft… about dedication. She couldn’t imagine all the hard work you’ve put in to get to where you are. And yet, to get so smug and mighty, over a hot dog eating contest? It made you furious! Lucian cheers as you immediately start chomping down again, driven by primal rage.

Fire in your eyes, you don’t even breathe as you wolf down more and more hot dogs. Before you know it, you’ve eaten 60… 70… 80! At 90, though, your second wind subsided, and you start to slow down. At this point, your belly was so round that you looked pregnant, and you didn’t know if you could fit any more food in there. You brought a hot dog to your lips, but you just couldn’t bring yourself to bite down. “Only ten more, Maura! You can do this!” Lucian said, egging you on.

“I… I can’t…” You whimpered, dropping the hot dog, already stuffed to capacity.

“Let me help, then!” Before you could respond, the mismagius levitated the hot dog in the air, and stuffed it into your mouth! Almost by instinct, you started chewing, and the the ghost-type slowly worked the hotdog down your throat. Just as you swallowed it, another was levitated into your mouth… and after that, another, and then another. Quickly, you were gagging and chewing as fast as you could as the mismagius force-fed you, feeling the skin of your belly stretch more and more with every additional hotdog. Finally, you let out a gasp as the last of them was slipped down your throat, leaving the plate empty.

“See? That wasn’t so much, was it?” The mismagius smiled. Meanwhile, you groaned, rubbing your paws over the taut skin of your sore belly. Your furry tummy was about the size of a beach ball at this point, and was gurgling and churning loudly as it go to work processing your huge feast. You could feel each and every hotdog inside of you, shifting around and squishing together with your every moment. Meanwhile, the mismagius looked at his stopwatch. “Hmm… you cleaned your plate iiinnn… nine minutes and twenty-six seconds. Not terrible… but we’ve got a lot of work ahead of us.”

“Ugh...” You loudly groaned, feeling like you might pop at any minute.

“Oh! Uh...” Lucian looks up, noticing your discomfort. “Well, that’s it for today. You should get some rest for the rest of the day — let it all digest.” He helps you dizzily walk over to the couch, your huge stomach swaying to and fro beneath you as you walked. You let out another groan as you laid back on the comfortable sofa, your stomach jiggling and glurping at the movement. The mismagius turned on the TV, letting you have something to watch while you processed your meal...
12521.title: Stuffed to the Brim

Ethan was no stranger to stories about humans. Some of the Pokemon in the Ice Path would often have the most outlandish tales about fearless trainers, structures high enough to reach the heavens, and metallic machines built for travelling long distances called cars and trucks. Ethan never put too much thought to these claims, in case they were little more than rumors, but seeing what appeared to be a truck in front of him was more than enough to pique his interest. Approaching somewhat hesitantly, Ethan noticed several boxes in the back of the truck, each one loaded with berries. But wait, some of these berries were in shapes and sizes he had never seen before. However, Ethan was unable to just stand there in awe; his gurgling stomach was also aware of the berries, and needless to say, it wanted some. Now.

Climbing onto the truck, Ethan was overwhelmed by the sheer number of berries neatly arranged before him. His first thought was to try one of the strange foreign berries he had just noticed. Grabbing a red, spiky berry, Ethan cautiously smelled it. A wise decision, as his nose detected tremendous heat. Looking around a bit, he found a green, slightly prickly berry that smelled sweet. Probably sweet enough to balance out the red berry's heat. Taking a deep breath, Ethan took a bite out of the red berry, and one out of the green berry immediately afterwards. Chewing both bites of berry simultaneously, Ethan was surprised by how well his theory worked. Sure, the mixture tasted a little sour, but sourness was never an issue with him. As he swallowed, Ethan was taken aback by another growl from his pudgy belly. Naturally, it makes sense that he's still hungry. He technically only took two bites, after all. But the timing of that growl seemed almost like his stomach was trying to tell him something. While this phenomena has happened to him before, it only ever happens whenever he has a food-related idea. So why would.........!!! That's it!!! If the two berries he tasted worked so well together, there's bound to be other combinations he could try!

The following afternoon was spent experimenting with the various berries the truck had to offer. Some combinations left him craving for more, others made him want to gag. Ethan could've gone on like this forever, but suddenly, a large hand had grabbed hold of him! Almost immediately, Ethan was face to face with an angry human. "Who do you think you are, eating up my inventory!" the human shouted in a deep, gruff voice. Ethan was terrified, to say the least. Sure, he could've attacked the human, and ran off, but he was paralyzed in fear. Noticing the berries clutched in Ethan's claws, the human's expression changed from anger to surprise almost instantly. "No way....." the human said. "Tell me one thing: were you mixing berries together to see how they'd taste?" Ethan nodded quickly, still fearful of what the human could do to him. "I see......You seem to be a little smarter than most Pokemon, seeing how you got the mental capacity to recognize and experiment with different flavors......." Softening his grip on Ethan, the human continued. "Listen, I need some help around my restaurant, but critics are giving me a hard time since I don't have a Pokemon. If you come live with me and lend a hand, I'll let you have all the berries you want. Whaddya say?"
